1 /**
  2  * @file timeline.js
  3  *
  4  * @brief
  5  * The Timeline is an interactive visualization chart to visualize events in
  6  * time, having a start and end date.
  7  * You can freely move and zoom in the timeline by dragging
  8  * and scrolling in the Timeline. Items are optionally dragable. The time
  9  * scale on the axis is adjusted automatically, and supports scales ranging
 10  * from milliseconds to years.
 11  *
 12  * Timeline is part of the CHAP Links library.
 13  *
 14  * Timeline is tested on Firefox 3.6, Safari 5.0, Chrome 6.0, Opera 10.6, and
 15  * Internet Explorer 6+.
 16  *
 17  * @license
 18  * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not
 19  * use this file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy
 20  * of the License at
 21  *
 22  * http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
 23  *
 24  * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
 25  * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT
 26  * WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the
 27  * License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under
 28  * the License.
 29  *
 30  * Copyright (c) 2011-2012 Almende B.V.
 31  *
 32  * @author 	Jos de Jong, <jos@almende.org>
 33  * @date    2012-09-18
 34  * @version 2.3.2
 35  */

 52 /**
 53  * Declare a unique namespace for CHAP's Common Hybrid Visualisation Library,
 54  * "links"
 55  */
 56 if (typeof links === 'undefined') {
 57     links = {};
 58     // important: do not use var, as "var links = {};" will overwrite 
 59     //            the existing links variable value with undefined in IE8, IE7.  
 60 }
 61 
 62 
 63 /**
 64  * Ensure the variable google exists
 65  */
 66 if (typeof google === 'undefined') {
 67     google = undefined;
 68     // important: do not use var, as "var google = undefined;" will overwrite 
 69     //            the existing google variable value with undefined in IE8, IE7.
 70 }

 72 
 73 /**
 74  * @constructor links.Timeline
 75  * The timeline is a visualization chart to visualize events in time.
 76  *
 77  * The timeline is developed in javascript as a Google Visualization Chart.
 78  *
 79  * @param {Element} container   The DOM element in which the Timeline will
 80  *                                  be created. Normally a div element.
 81  */
 82 links.Timeline = function(container) {
 83     // create variables and set default values
 84     this.dom = {};
 85     this.conversion = {};
 86     this.eventParams = {}; // stores parameters for mouse events
 87     this.groups = [];
 88     this.groupIndexes = {};
 89     this.items = [];
 90     this.selection = undefined; // stores index and item which is currently selected
 91 
 92     this.listeners = {}; // event listener callbacks
 93 
 94     // Initialize sizes. 
 95     // Needed for IE (which gives an error when you try to set an undefined
 96     // value in a style)
 97     this.size = {
 98         'actualHeight': 0,
 99         'axis': {
100             'characterMajorHeight': 0,
101             'characterMajorWidth': 0,
102             'characterMinorHeight': 0,
103             'characterMinorWidth': 0,
104             'height': 0,
105             'labelMajorTop': 0,
106             'labelMinorTop': 0,
107             'line': 0,
108             'lineMajorWidth': 0,
109             'lineMinorHeight': 0,
110             'lineMinorTop': 0,
111             'lineMinorWidth': 0,
112             'top': 0
113         },
114         'contentHeight': 0,
115         'contentLeft': 0,
116         'contentWidth': 0,
117         'dataChanged': false,
118         'frameHeight': 0,
119         'frameWidth': 0,
120         'groupsLeft': 0,
121         'groupsWidth': 0,
122         'items': {
123             'top': 0
124         }
125     };
126 
127     this.dom.container = container;
128 
129     this.options = {
130         'width': "100%",
131         'height': "auto",
132         'minHeight': 0,       // minimal height in pixels
133         'autoHeight': true,
134 
135         'eventMargin': 10,    // minimal margin between events 
136         'eventMarginAxis': 20, // minimal margin beteen events and the axis
137         'dragAreaWidth': 10, // pixels
138 
139         'min': undefined,
140         'max': undefined,
141         'intervalMin': 10,  // milliseconds
142         'intervalMax': 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 365 * 10000, // milliseconds
143 
144         'moveable': true,
145         'zoomable': true,
146         'selectable': true,
147         'editable': false,
148         'snapEvents': true,
149         'groupChangeable': true,
150 
151         'showCurrentTime': true, // show a red bar displaying the current time
152         'showCustomTime': false, // show a blue, draggable bar displaying a custom time    
153         'showMajorLabels': true,
154         'showMinorLabels': true,
155         'showNavigation': false,
156         'showButtonAdd': true,
157         'groupsOnRight': false,
158         'axisOnTop': false,
159         'stackEvents': true,
160         'animate': true,
161         'animateZoom': true,
162         'style': 'box'
163     };
164 
165     this.clientTimeOffset = 0;    // difference between client time and the time
166     // set via Timeline.setCurrentTime()
167     var dom = this.dom;
168 
169     // remove all elements from the container element.
170     while (dom.container.hasChildNodes()) {
171         dom.container.removeChild(dom.container.firstChild);
172     }
173 
174     // create a step for drawing the axis
175     this.step = new links.Timeline.StepDate();
176 
177     // initialize data
178     this.data = [];
179     this.firstDraw = true;
180 
181     // date interval must be initialized 
182     this.setVisibleChartRange(undefined, undefined, false);
183 
184     // create all DOM elements
185     this.redrawFrame();
186 
187     // Internet Explorer does not support Array.indexof, 
188     // so we define it here in that case
189     // http://soledadpenades.com/2007/05/17/arrayindexof-in-internet-explorer/
190     if(!Array.prototype.indexOf) {
191         Array.prototype.indexOf = function(obj){
192             for(var i = 0; i < this.length; i++){
193                 if(this[i] == obj){
194                     return i;
195                 }
196             }
197             return -1;
198         }
199     }
200 
201     // fire the ready event
202     this.trigger('ready');
203 };
204 
205 
206 /**
207  * Main drawing logic. This is the function that needs to be called
208  * in the html page, to draw the timeline.
209  *
210  * A data table with the events must be provided, and an options table.
211  *
212  * @param {google.visualization.DataTable}      data
213  *                                 The data containing the events for the timeline.
214  *                                 Object DataTable is defined in
215  *                                 google.visualization.DataTable
216  * @param {Object} options         A name/value map containing settings for the
217  *                                 timeline. Optional.
218  */
219 links.Timeline.prototype.draw = function(data, options) {
220     this.setOptions(options);
221 
222     // read the data
223     this.setData(data);
224 
225     // set timer range. this will also redraw the timeline
226     if (options && (options.start || options.end)) {
227         this.setVisibleChartRange(options.start, options.end);
228     }
229     else if (this.firstDraw) {
230         this.setVisibleChartRangeAuto();
231     }
232 
233     this.firstDraw = false;
234 };
235 
236 
237 /**
238  * Set options for the timeline.
239  * Timeline must be redrawn afterwards
240  * @param {Object} options A name/value map containing settings for the
241  *                                 timeline. Optional.
242  */
243 links.Timeline.prototype.setOptions = function(options) {
244     if (options) {
245         // retrieve parameter values
246         for (var i in options) {
247             if (options.hasOwnProperty(i)) {
248                 this.options[i] = options[i];
249             }
250         }
251     }
252 
253     // validate options
254     this.options.autoHeight = (this.options.height === "auto");
255 };
256 
257 /**
258  * Find a column by its label in a Google DataTable
259  * @param {google.visualization.DataTable} dataTable
260  * @param {String} label          label name of the column to be found
261  * @return {Number} columnId      returns the column id of the column if found,
262  *                                or undefined when not found.
263  */
264 links.Timeline.findColumnId = function (dataTable, label) {
265     for (var i = 0, iMax = dataTable.getNumberOfColumns(); i < iMax; i++) {
266         if (dataTable.getColumnLabel(i) == label) {
267             return i;
268         }
269     }
270 
271     return undefined;
272 };
273 
274 /**
275  * Set data for the timeline
276  * @param {google.visualization.DataTable | Array} data
277  */
278 links.Timeline.prototype.setData = function(data) {
279     // unselect any previously selected item
280     this.unselectItem();
281 
282     if (!data) {
283         data = [];
284     }
285 
286     // clear all data
287     this.items = [];
288     this.data = data;
289     var items = this.items;
290     this.deleteGroups();
291 
292     if (google && google.visualization &&
293         data instanceof google.visualization.DataTable) {
294         // read DataTable
295         var groupCol = links.Timeline.findColumnId(data, 'group');
296         var classNameCol = links.Timeline.findColumnId(data, 'className');
297 
298         for (var row = 0, rows = data.getNumberOfRows(); row < rows; row++) {
299             items.push(this.createItem({
300                 'start': data.getValue(row, 0),
301                 'end': data.getValue(row, 1),
302                 'content': data.getValue(row, 2),
303                 'group': ((groupCol != undefined) ? data.getValue(row, groupCol) : undefined),
304                 'className': ((classNameCol != undefined) ? data.getValue(row, classNameCol) : undefined)
305             }));
306         }
307     }
308     else if (links.Timeline.isArray(data)) {
309         // read JSON array
310         for (var row = 0, rows = data.length; row < rows; row++) {
311             var itemData = data[row];
312             var item = this.createItem(itemData);
313             items.push(item);
314         }
315     }
316     else {
317         throw "Unknown data type. DataTable or Array expected.";
318     }
319 
320     // set a flag to force the recalcSize method to recalculate the 
321     // heights and widths of the events
322     this.size.dataChanged = true;
323     this.redrawFrame();      // create the items for the new data
324     this.recalcSize();       // position the items
325     this.stackEvents(false);
326     this.redrawFrame();      // redraw the items on the final positions
327     this.size.dataChanged = false;
328 };
329 
330 /**
331  * Return the original data table.
332  * @return {google.visualization.DataTable | Array} data
333  */
334 links.Timeline.prototype.getData = function  () {
335     return this.data;
336 };
337 
338 
339 /**
340  * Update the original data with changed start, end or group.
341  *
342  * @param {Number} index
343  * @param {Object} values   An object containing some of the following parameters:
344  *                          {Date} start,
345  *                          {Date} end,
346  *                          {String} content,
347  *                          {String} group
348  */
349 links.Timeline.prototype.updateData = function  (index, values) {
350     var data = this.data;
351 
352     if (google && google.visualization &&
353         data instanceof google.visualization.DataTable) {
354         // update the original google DataTable
355         var missingRows = (index + 1) - data.getNumberOfRows();
356         if (missingRows > 0) {
357             data.addRows(missingRows);
358         }
359 
360         if (values.start) {
361             data.setValue(index, 0, values.start);
362         }
363         if (values.end) {
364             data.setValue(index, 1, values.end);
365         }
366         if (values.content) {
367             data.setValue(index, 2, values.content);
368         }
369 
370         var groupCol = links.Timeline.findColumnId(data, 'group');
371         if (values.group && groupCol != undefined) {
372             // TODO: append a column when needed?
373             data.setValue(index, groupCol, values.group);
374         }
375 
376         var classNameCol = links.Timeline.findColumnId(data, 'className');
377         if (values.className && classNameCol != undefined) {
378             data.setValue(index, classNameCol, values.className);
379         }
380     }
381     else if (links.Timeline.isArray(data)) {
382         // update the original JSON table
383         var row = data[index];
384         if (row == undefined) {
385             row = {};
386             data[index] = row;
387         }
388 
389         if (values.start) {
390             row.start = values.start;
391         }
392         if (values.end) {
393             row.end = values.end;
394         }
395         if (values.content) {
396             row.content = values.content;
397         }
398         if (values.group) {
399             row.group = values.group;
400         }
401         if (values.className) {
402             row.className = values.className;
403         }
404     }
405     else {
406         throw "Cannot update data, unknown type of data";
407     }
408 };
409 
410 /**
411  * Find the item index from a given HTML element
412  * If no item index is found, undefined is returned
413  * @param {Element} element
414  * @return {Number} index
415  */
416 links.Timeline.prototype.getItemIndex = function(element) {
417     var e = element,
418         dom = this.dom,
419         items = this.items,
420         index = undefined;
421 
422     // try to find the frame where the items are located in
423     while (e.parentNode && e.parentNode !== dom.items.frame) {
424         e = e.parentNode;
425     }
426 
427     if (e.parentNode === dom.items.frame) {
428         // yes! we have found the parent element of all items
429         // retrieve its id from the array with items
430         for (var i = 0, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
431             if (items[i].dom === e) {
432                 index = i;
433                 break;
434             }
435         }
436     }
437 
438     return index;
439 };
440 
441 /**
442  * Set a new size for the timeline
443  * @param {string} width   Width in pixels or percentage (for example "800px"
444  *                         or "50%")
445  * @param {string} height  Height in pixels or percentage  (for example "400px"
446  *                         or "30%")
447  */
448 links.Timeline.prototype.setSize = function(width, height) {
449     if (width) {
450         this.options.width = width;
451         this.dom.frame.style.width = width;
452     }
453     if (height) {
454         this.options.height = height;
455         this.options.autoHeight = (this.options.height === "auto");
456         if (height !==  "auto" ) {
457             this.dom.frame.style.height = height;
458         }
459     }
460 
461     this.recalcSize();
462     this.stackEvents(false);
463     this.redrawFrame();
464 };
465 
466 
467 /**
468  * Set a new value for the visible range int the timeline.
469  * Set start undefined to include everything from the earliest date to end.
470  * Set end undefined to include everything from start to the last date.
471  * Example usage:
472  *    myTimeline.setVisibleChartRange(new Date("2010-08-22"),
473  *                                    new Date("2010-09-13"));
474  * @param {Date}   start     The start date for the timeline. optional
475  * @param {Date}   end       The end date for the timeline. optional
476  * @param {boolean} redraw   Optional. If true (default) the Timeline is
477  *                           directly redrawn
478  */
479 links.Timeline.prototype.setVisibleChartRange = function(start, end, redraw) {
480     var range = {};
481     if (!start || !end) {
482         // retrieve the date range of the items
483         range = this.getDataRange(true);
484     }
485 
486     if (!start) {
487         if (end) {
488             if (range.min && range.min.valueOf() < end.valueOf()) {
489                 // start of the data
490                 start = range.min;
491             }
492             else {
493                 // 7 days before the end
494                 start = new Date(end);
495                 start.setDate(start.getDate() - 7);
496             }
497         }
498         else {
499             // default of 3 days ago
500             start = new Date();
501             start.setDate(start.getDate() - 3);
502         }
503     }
504 
505     if (!end) {
506         if (range.max) {
507             // end of the data
508             end = range.max;
509         }
510         else {
511             // 7 days after start
512             end = new Date(start);
513             end.setDate(end.getDate() + 7);
514         }
515     }
516 
517     // prevent start Date <= end Date
518     if (end.valueOf() <= start.valueOf()) {
519         end = new Date(start);
520         end.setDate(end.getDate() + 7);
521     }
522 
523     // limit to the allowed range (don't let this do by applyRange,
524     // because that method will try to maintain the interval (end-start)
525     var min = this.options.min ? this.options.min.valueOf() : undefined;
526     if (min != undefined && start.valueOf() < min) {
527         start = new Date(min);
528     }
529     var max = this.options.max ? this.options.max.valueOf() : undefined;
530     if (max != undefined && end.valueOf() > max) {
531         end = new Date(max);
532     }
533 
534     this.applyRange(start, end);
535 
536     if (redraw == undefined || redraw == true) {
537         this.recalcSize();
538         this.stackEvents(false);
539         this.redrawFrame();
540     }
541     else {
542         this.recalcConversion();
543     }
544 };
545 
546 
547 /**
548  * Change the visible chart range such that all items become visible
549  */
550 links.Timeline.prototype.setVisibleChartRangeAuto = function() {
551     var range = this.getDataRange(true),
552         start = undefined,
553         end = undefined;
554     this.setVisibleChartRange(range.min, range.max);
555 };
556 
557 /**
558  * Adjust the visible range such that the current time is located in the center
559  * of the timeline
560  */
561 links.Timeline.prototype.setVisibleChartRangeNow = function() {
562     var now = new Date();
563 
564     var diff = (this.end.getTime() - this.start.getTime());
565 
566     var startNew = new Date(now.getTime() - diff/2);
567     var endNew = new Date(startNew.getTime() + diff);
568     this.setVisibleChartRange(startNew, endNew);
569 };
570 
571 
572 /**
573  * Retrieve the current visible range in the timeline.
574  * @return {Object} An object with start and end properties
575  */
576 links.Timeline.prototype.getVisibleChartRange = function() {
577     var range = {
578         'start': new Date(this.start),
579         'end': new Date(this.end)
580     };
581     return range;
582 };
583 
584 /**
585  * Get the date range of the items.
586  * @param {boolean} [withMargin]  If true, 5% of whitespace is added to the
587  *                                left and right of the range. Default is false.
588  * @return {Object} range    An object with parameters min and max.
589  *                           - {Date} min is the lowest start date of the items
590  *                           - {Date} max is the highest start or end date of the items
591  *                           If no data is available, the values of min and max
592  *                           will be undefined
593  */
594 links.Timeline.prototype.getDataRange = function (withMargin) {
595     var items = this.items,
596         min = undefined,
597         max = undefined;
598 
599     if (items) {
600         for (var i = 0, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
601             var item = items[i],
602                 start = item.start ? item.start.valueOf() : undefined,
603                 end = item.end ? item.end.valueOf() : start;
604 
605             if (min != undefined && start != undefined) {
606                 min = Math.min(min, start);
607             }
608             else {
609                 min = start;
610             }
611 
612             if (max != undefined && end != undefined) {
613                 max = Math.max(max, end);
614             }
615             else {
616                 max = end;
617             }
618         }
619     }
620 
621     if (min && max && withMargin) {
622         // zoom out 5% such that you have a little white space on the left and right
623         var diff = (max.valueOf() - min.valueOf());
624         min = new Date(min.valueOf() - diff * 0.05);
625         max = new Date(max.valueOf() + diff * 0.05);
626     }
627 
628     return {
629         'min': min ? new Date(min) : undefined,
630         'max': max ? new Date(max) : undefined
631     };
632 }
633 
634 /**
635  * Redraw the timeline. This needs to be executed after the start and/or
636  * end time are changed, or when data is added or removed dynamically.
637  */
638 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawFrame = function() {
639     var dom = this.dom,
640         options = this.options,
641         size = this.size;
642 
643     if (!dom.frame) {
644         // the surrounding main frame
645         dom.frame = document.createElement("DIV");
646         dom.frame.className = "timeline-frame";
647         dom.frame.style.position = "relative";
648         dom.frame.style.overflow = "hidden";
649         dom.container.appendChild(dom.frame);
650     }
651 
652     if (options.autoHeight) {
653         dom.frame.style.height = size.frameHeight + "px";
654     }
655     else {
656         dom.frame.style.height = options.height || "100%";
657     }
658     dom.frame.style.width = options.width  || "100%";
659 
660     this.redrawContent();
661     this.redrawGroups();
662     this.redrawCurrentTime();
663     this.redrawCustomTime();
664     this.redrawNavigation();
665 };
666 
667 
668 /**
669  * Redraw the content of the timeline: the axis and the items
670  */
671 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawContent = function() {
672     var dom = this.dom,
673         size = this.size;
674 
675     if (!dom.content) {
676         // create content box where the axis and canvas will 
677         dom.content = document.createElement("DIV");
678         //this.frame.className = "timeline-frame";
679         dom.content.style.position = "relative";
680         dom.content.style.overflow = "hidden";
681         dom.frame.appendChild(dom.content);
682 
683         var timelines = document.createElement("DIV");
684         timelines.style.position = "absolute";
685         timelines.style.left = "0px";
686         timelines.style.top = "0px";
687         timelines.style.height = "100%";
688         timelines.style.width = "0px";
689         dom.content.appendChild(timelines);
690         dom.contentTimelines = timelines;
691 
692         var params = this.eventParams,
693             me = this;
694         if (!params.onMouseDown) {
695             params.onMouseDown = function (event) {me.onMouseDown(event);};
696             links.Timeline.addEventListener(dom.content, "mousedown", params.onMouseDown);
697         }
698         if (!params.onTouchStart) {
699             params.onTouchStart = function (event) {me.onTouchStart(event);};
700             links.Timeline.addEventListener(dom.content, "touchstart", params.onTouchStart);
701         }
702         if (!params.onMouseWheel) {
703             params.onMouseWheel = function (event) {me.onMouseWheel(event);};
704             links.Timeline.addEventListener(dom.content, "mousewheel", params.onMouseWheel);
705         }
706         if (!params.onDblClick) {
707             params.onDblClick = function (event) {me.onDblClick(event);};
708             links.Timeline.addEventListener(dom.content, "dblclick", params.onDblClick);
709         }
710     }
711     dom.content.style.left = size.contentLeft + "px";
712     dom.content.style.top = "0px";
713     dom.content.style.width = size.contentWidth + "px";
714     dom.content.style.height = size.frameHeight + "px";
715 
716     this.redrawAxis();
717     this.redrawItems();
718     this.redrawDeleteButton();
719     this.redrawDragAreas();
720 };
721 
722 /**
723  * Redraw the timeline axis with minor and major labels
724  */
725 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawAxis = function() {
726     var dom = this.dom,
727         options = this.options,
728         size = this.size,
729         step = this.step;
730 
731     var axis = dom.axis;
732     if (!axis) {
733         axis = {};
734         dom.axis = axis;
735     }
736     if (size.axis.properties === undefined) {
737         size.axis.properties = {};
738     }
739     if (axis.minorTexts === undefined) {
740         axis.minorTexts = [];
741     }
742     if (axis.minorLines === undefined) {
743         axis.minorLines = [];
744     }
745     if (axis.majorTexts === undefined) {
746         axis.majorTexts = [];
747     }
748     if (axis.majorLines === undefined) {
749         axis.majorLines = [];
750     }
751 
752     if (!axis.frame) {
753         axis.frame = document.createElement("DIV");
754         axis.frame.style.position = "absolute";
755         axis.frame.style.left = "0px";
756         axis.frame.style.top = "0px";
757         dom.content.appendChild(axis.frame);
758     }
759 
760     // take axis offline
761     dom.content.removeChild(axis.frame);
762 
763     axis.frame.style.width = (size.contentWidth) + "px";
764     axis.frame.style.height = (size.axis.height) + "px";
765 
766     // the drawn axis is more wide than the actual visual part, such that
767     // the axis can be dragged without having to redraw it each time again.
768     var start = this.screenToTime(0);
769     var end = this.screenToTime(size.contentWidth);
770     var width = size.contentWidth;
771 
772     // calculate minimum step (in milliseconds) based on character size
773     this.minimumStep = this.screenToTime(size.axis.characterMinorWidth * 6).valueOf() -
774         this.screenToTime(0).valueOf();
775 
776     step.setRange(start, end, this.minimumStep);
777 
778     this.redrawAxisCharacters();
779 
780     this.redrawAxisStartOverwriting();
781 
782     step.start();
783     var xFirstMajorLabel = undefined;
784     while (!step.end()) {
785         var cur = step.getCurrent(),
786             x = this.timeToScreen(cur),
787             isMajor = step.isMajor();
788 
789         if (options.showMinorLabels) {
790             this.redrawAxisMinorText(x, step.getLabelMinor());
791         }
792 
793         if (isMajor && options.showMajorLabels) {
794             if (x > 0) {
795                 if (xFirstMajorLabel === undefined) {
796                     xFirstMajorLabel = x;
797                 }
798                 this.redrawAxisMajorText(x, step.getLabelMajor());
799             }
800             this.redrawAxisMajorLine(x);
801         }
802         else {
803             this.redrawAxisMinorLine(x);
804         }
805 
806         step.next();
807     }
808 
809     // create a major label on the left when needed
810     if (options.showMajorLabels) {
811         var leftTime = this.screenToTime(0),
812             leftText = this.step.getLabelMajor(leftTime),
813             width = leftText.length * size.axis.characterMajorWidth + 10;// estimation
814 
815         if (xFirstMajorLabel === undefined || width < xFirstMajorLabel) {
816             this.redrawAxisMajorText(0, leftText, leftTime);
817         }
818     }
819 
820     this.redrawAxisHorizontal();
821 
822     // cleanup left over labels
823     this.redrawAxisEndOverwriting();
824 
825     // put axis online
826     dom.content.insertBefore(axis.frame, dom.content.firstChild);
827 };
828 
829 /**
830  * Create characters used to determine the size of text on the axis
831  */
832 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawAxisCharacters = function () {
833     // calculate the width and height of a single character
834     // this is used to calculate the step size, and also the positioning of the
835     // axis
836     var dom = this.dom,
837         axis = dom.axis;
838 
839     if (!axis.characterMinor) {
840         var text = document.createTextNode("0");
841         var characterMinor = document.createElement("DIV");
842         characterMinor.className = "timeline-axis-text timeline-axis-text-minor";
843         characterMinor.appendChild(text);
844         characterMinor.style.position = "absolute";
845         characterMinor.style.visibility = "hidden";
846         characterMinor.style.paddingLeft = "0px";
847         characterMinor.style.paddingRight = "0px";
848         axis.frame.appendChild(characterMinor);
849 
850         axis.characterMinor = characterMinor;
851     }
852 
853     if (!axis.characterMajor) {
854         var text = document.createTextNode("0");
855         var characterMajor = document.createElement("DIV");
856         characterMajor.className = "timeline-axis-text timeline-axis-text-major";
857         characterMajor.appendChild(text);
858         characterMajor.style.position = "absolute";
859         characterMajor.style.visibility = "hidden";
860         characterMajor.style.paddingLeft = "0px";
861         characterMajor.style.paddingRight = "0px";
862         axis.frame.appendChild(characterMajor);
863 
864         axis.characterMajor = characterMajor;
865     }
866 };
867 
868 /**
869  * Initialize redraw of the axis. All existing labels and lines will be
870  * overwritten and reused.
871  */
872 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawAxisStartOverwriting = function () {
873     var properties = this.size.axis.properties;
874 
875     properties.minorTextNum = 0;
876     properties.minorLineNum = 0;
877     properties.majorTextNum = 0;
878     properties.majorLineNum = 0;
879 };
880 
881 /**
882  * End of overwriting HTML DOM elements of the axis.
883  * remaining elements will be removed
884  */
885 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawAxisEndOverwriting = function () {
886     var dom = this.dom,
887         props = this.size.axis.properties,
888         frame = this.dom.axis.frame;
889 
890     // remove leftovers
891     var minorTexts = dom.axis.minorTexts,
892         num = props.minorTextNum;
893     while (minorTexts.length > num) {
894         var minorText = minorTexts[num];
895         frame.removeChild(minorText);
896         minorTexts.splice(num, 1);
897     }
898 
899     var minorLines = dom.axis.minorLines,
900         num = props.minorLineNum;
901     while (minorLines.length > num) {
902         var minorLine = minorLines[num];
903         frame.removeChild(minorLine);
904         minorLines.splice(num, 1);
905     }
906 
907     var majorTexts = dom.axis.majorTexts,
908         num = props.majorTextNum;
909     while (majorTexts.length > num) {
910         var majorText = majorTexts[num];
911         frame.removeChild(majorText);
912         majorTexts.splice(num, 1);
913     }
914 
915     var majorLines = dom.axis.majorLines,
916         num = props.majorLineNum;
917     while (majorLines.length > num) {
918         var majorLine = majorLines[num];
919         frame.removeChild(majorLine);
920         majorLines.splice(num, 1);
921     }
922 };
923 
924 /**
925  * Redraw the horizontal line and background of the axis
926  */
927 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawAxisHorizontal = function() {
928     var axis = this.dom.axis,
929         size = this.size,
930         options = this.options;
931 
932     // line behind all axis elements (possibly having a background color)
933     var hasAxis = (options.showMinorLabels || options.showMajorLabels);
934     if (hasAxis) {
935         if (!axis.backgroundLine) {
936             // create the axis line background (for a background color or so)
937             var backgroundLine = document.createElement("DIV");
938             backgroundLine.className = "timeline-axis";
939             backgroundLine.style.position = "absolute";
940             backgroundLine.style.left = "0px";
941             backgroundLine.style.width = "100%";
942             backgroundLine.style.border = "none";
943             axis.frame.insertBefore(backgroundLine, axis.frame.firstChild);
944 
945             axis.backgroundLine = backgroundLine;
946         }
947 
948         if (axis.backgroundLine) {
949             axis.backgroundLine.style.top = size.axis.top + "px";
950             axis.backgroundLine.style.height = size.axis.height + "px";
951         }
952     }
953     else {
954         if (axis.backgroundLine) {
955             axis.frame.removeChild(axis.backgroundLine);
956             delete axis.backgroundLine;
957         }
958     }
959 
960     // line before all axis elements
961     if (hasAxis) {
962         if (axis.line) {
963             // put this line at the end of all childs
964             var line = axis.frame.removeChild(axis.line);
965             axis.frame.appendChild(line);
966         }
967         else {
968             // make the axis line
969             var line = document.createElement("DIV");
970             line.className = "timeline-axis";
971             line.style.position = "absolute";
972             line.style.left = "0px";
973             line.style.width = "100%";
974             line.style.height = "0px";
975             axis.frame.appendChild(line);
976 
977             axis.line = line;
978         }
979         axis.line.style.top = size.axis.line + "px";
980     }
981     else {
982         if (axis.line && axis.line.parentElement) {
983             axis.frame.removeChild(axis.line);
984             delete axis.line;
985         }
986     }
987 };
988 
989 /**
990  * Create a minor label for the axis at position x
991  * @param {Number} x
992  * @param {String} text
993  */
994 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawAxisMinorText = function (x, text) {
995     var size = this.size,
996         dom = this.dom,
997         props = size.axis.properties,
998         frame = dom.axis.frame,
999         minorTexts = dom.axis.minorTexts,
1000         index = props.minorTextNum,
1001         label;
1002 
1003     if (index < minorTexts.length) {
1004         label = minorTexts[index]
1005     }
1006     else {
1007         // create new label
1008         var content = document.createTextNode(""),
1009             label = document.createElement("DIV");
1010         label.appendChild(content);
1011         label.className = "timeline-axis-text timeline-axis-text-minor";
1012         label.style.position = "absolute";
1013 
1014         frame.appendChild(label);
1015 
1016         minorTexts.push(label);
1017     }
1018 
1019     label.childNodes[0].nodeValue = text;
1020     label.style.left = x + "px";
1021     label.style.top  = size.axis.labelMinorTop + "px";
1022     //label.title = title;  // TODO: this is a heavy operation
1023 
1024     props.minorTextNum++;
1025 };

1028  * Create a minor line for the axis at position x
1029  * @param {Number} x
1030  */
1031 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawAxisMinorLine = function (x) {
1032     var axis = this.size.axis,
1033         dom = this.dom,

1035         frame = dom.axis.frame,
1036         minorLines = dom.axis.minorLines,
1037         index = props.minorLineNum,
1038         line;
1039 
1040     if (index < minorLines.length) {
1041         line = minorLines[index];
1042     }
1043     else {
1044         // create vertical line
1045         line = document.createElement("DIV");
1046         line.className = "timeline-axis-grid timeline-axis-grid-minor";
1047         line.style.position = "absolute";
1048         line.style.width = "0px";
1049 
1050         frame.appendChild(line);
1051         minorLines.push(line);
1052     }
1053 
1054     line.style.top = axis.lineMinorTop + "px";
1055     line.style.height = axis.lineMinorHeight + "px";
1056     line.style.left = (x - axis.lineMinorWidth/2) + "px";
1057 
1058     props.minorLineNum++;
1059 };

1132 /**
1133  * Redraw all items
1134  */
1135 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawItems = function() {
1136     var dom = this.dom,
1137         options = this.options,
1138         boxAlign = (options.box && options.box.align) ? options.box.align : undefined,
1139         size = this.size,
1140         contentWidth = size.contentWidth,
1141         items = this.items;
1142 
1143     if (!dom.items) {
1144         dom.items = {};
1145     }
1146 
1147     // draw the frame containing the items
1148     var frame = dom.items.frame;
1149     if (!frame) {
1150         frame = document.createElement("DIV");
1151         frame.style.position = "relative";
1152         dom.content.appendChild(frame);
1153         dom.items.frame = frame;
1154     }
1155 
1156     frame.style.left = "0px";
1157     frame.style.top = size.items.top + "px";
1158     frame.style.height = "0px";
1159 
1160     // initialize arrarys for storing the items
1161     var ranges = dom.items.ranges;
1162     if (!ranges) {
1163         ranges = [];
1164         dom.items.ranges = ranges;
1165     }
1166     var boxes = dom.items.boxes;
1167     if (!boxes) {
1168         boxes = [];
1169         dom.items.boxes = boxes;
1170     }
1171     var dots = dom.items.dots;
1172     if (!dots) {
1173         dots = [];
1174         dom.items.dots = dots;
1175     }
1176 
1177     // Take frame offline
1178     dom.content.removeChild(frame);
1179 
1180     if (size.dataChanged) {
1181         // create the items
1182         var rangesCreated = ranges.length,
1183             boxesCreated = boxes.length,
1184             dotsCreated = dots.length,
1185             rangesUsed = 0,
1186             boxesUsed = 0,
1187             dotsUsed = 0,
1188             itemsLength = items.length;
1189 
1190         for (var i = 0, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1191             var item = items[i];
1192             switch (item.type) {
1193                 case 'range':
1194                     if (rangesUsed < rangesCreated) {
1195                         // reuse existing range
1196                         var domItem = ranges[rangesUsed];
1197                         domItem.firstChild.innerHTML = item.content;
1198                         domItem.style.display = '';
1199                         item.dom = domItem;
1200                         rangesUsed++;
1201                     }
1202                     else {
1203                         // create a new range
1204                         var domItem = this.createEventRange(item);
1205                         ranges[rangesUsed] = domItem;
1206                         frame.appendChild(domItem);
1207                         item.dom = domItem;
1208                         rangesUsed++;
1209                         rangesCreated++;
1210                     }
1211                     this.updateEventRange(item);
1212                     break;
1213 
1214                 case 'box':
1215                     if (boxesUsed < boxesCreated) {
1216                         // reuse existing box
1217                         var domItem = boxes[boxesUsed];
1218                         domItem.style.display = '';
1219                         item.dom = domItem;
1220                         boxesUsed++;
1221                     }
1222                     else {
1223                         // create a new box
1224                         var domItem = this.createEventBox(item);
1225                         boxes[boxesUsed] = domItem;
1226                         frame.appendChild(domItem);
1227                         frame.insertBefore(domItem.line, frame.firstChild);
1228                         // Note: line must be added in front of the items, 
1229                         //       such that it stays below all items
1230                         frame.appendChild(domItem.dot);
1231                         item.dom = domItem;
1232                         boxesUsed++;
1233                         boxesCreated++;
1234                     }
1235                     this.updateEventBox(item);
1236                     break;
1237 
1238                 case 'dot':
1239                     if (dotsUsed < dotsCreated) {
1240                         // reuse existing box
1241                         var domItem = dots[dotsUsed];
1242                         domItem.firstChild.innerHTML = item.content;
1243                         domItem.style.display = '';
1244                         item.dom = domItem;
1245                         dotsUsed++;
1246                     }
1247                     else {
1248                         // create a new box
1249                         var domItem = this.createEventDot(item);
1250                         dots[dotsUsed] = domItem;
1251                         frame.appendChild(domItem);
1252                         item.dom = domItem;
1253                         dotsUsed++;
1254                         dotsCreated++;
1255                     }
1256                     this.updateEventDot(item);
1257                     break;
1258 
1259                 default:
1260                     // do nothing
1261                     break;
1262             }
1263         }
1264 
1265         // remove redundant items when needed
1266         for (var i = rangesUsed; i < rangesCreated; i++) {
1267             frame.removeChild(ranges[i]);
1268         }
1269         ranges.splice(rangesUsed, rangesCreated - rangesUsed);
1270         for (var i = boxesUsed; i < boxesCreated; i++) {
1271             var box = boxes[i];
1272             frame.removeChild(box.line);
1273             frame.removeChild(box.dot);
1274             frame.removeChild(box);
1275         }
1276         boxes.splice(boxesUsed, boxesCreated - boxesUsed);
1277         for (var i = dotsUsed; i < dotsCreated; i++) {
1278             frame.removeChild(dots[i]);
1279         }
1280         dots.splice(dotsUsed, dotsCreated - dotsUsed);
1281     }
1282 
1283     // reposition all items
1284     for (var i = 0, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1285         var item = items[i],
1286             domItem = item.dom;
1287 
1288         switch (item.type) {
1289             case 'range':
1290                 var left = this.timeToScreen(item.start),
1291                     right = this.timeToScreen(item.end);
1292 
1293                 // limit the width of the item, as browsers cannot draw very wide divs
1294                 if (left < -contentWidth) {
1295                     left = -contentWidth;
1296                 }
1297                 if (right > 2 * contentWidth) {
1298                     right = 2 * contentWidth;
1299                 }
1300 
1301                 var visible = right > -contentWidth && left < 2 * contentWidth;
1302                 if (visible || size.dataChanged) {
1303                     // when data is changed, all items must be kept visible, as their heights must be measured
1304                     if (item.hidden) {
1305                         item.hidden = false;
1306                         domItem.style.display = '';
1307                     }
1308                     domItem.style.top = item.top + "px";
1309                     domItem.style.left = left + "px";
1310                     //domItem.style.width = Math.max(right - left - 2 * item.borderWidth, 1) + "px"; // TODO: borderWidth
1311                     domItem.style.width = Math.max(right - left, 1) + "px";
1312                 }
1313                 else {
1314                     // hide when outside of the current window
1315                     if (!item.hidden) {
1316                         domItem.style.display = 'none';
1317                         item.hidden = true;
1318                     }
1319                 }
1320 
1321                 break;
1322 
1323             case 'box':
1324                 var left = this.timeToScreen(item.start);
1325 
1326                 var axisOnTop = options.axisOnTop,
1327                     axisHeight = size.axis.height,
1328                     axisTop = size.axis.top;
1329                 var visible = ((left + item.width/2 > -contentWidth) &&
1330                     (left - item.width/2 < 2 * contentWidth));
1331                 if (visible || size.dataChanged) {
1332                     // when data is changed, all items must be kept visible, as their heights must be measured
1333                     if (item.hidden) {
1334                         item.hidden = false;
1335                         domItem.style.display = '';
1336                         domItem.line.style.display = '';
1337                         domItem.dot.style.display = '';
1338                     }
1339                     domItem.style.top = item.top + "px";
1340                     if (boxAlign == 'right') {
1341                         domItem.style.left = (left - item.width) + "px";
1342                     }
1343                     else if (boxAlign == 'left') {
1344                         domItem.style.left = (left) + "px";
1345                     }
1346                     else { // default or 'center'
1347                         domItem.style.left = (left - item.width/2) + "px";
1348                     }
1349 
1350                     var line = domItem.line;
1351                     line.style.left = (left - item.lineWidth/2) + "px";
1352                     if (axisOnTop) {
1353                         line.style.top = "0px";
1354                         line.style.height = Math.max(item.top, 0) + "px";
1355                     }
1356                     else {
1357                         line.style.top = (item.top + item.height) + "px";
1358                         line.style.height = Math.max(axisTop - item.top - item.height, 0) + "px";
1359                     }
1360 
1361                     var dot = domItem.dot;
1362                     dot.style.left = (left - item.dotWidth/2) + "px";
1363                     dot.style.top = (axisTop - item.dotHeight/2) + "px";
1364                 }
1365                 else {
1366                     // hide when outside of the current window
1367                     if (!item.hidden) {
1368                         domItem.style.display = 'none';
1369                         domItem.line.style.display = 'none';
1370                         domItem.dot.style.display = 'none';
1371                         item.hidden = true;
1372                     }
1373                 }
1374                 break;
1375 
1376             case 'dot':
1377                 var left = this.timeToScreen(item.start);
1378 
1379                 var axisOnTop = options.axisOnTop,
1380                     axisHeight = size.axis.height,
1381                     axisTop = size.axis.top;
1382                 var visible = (left + item.width > -contentWidth) && (left < 2 * contentWidth);
1383                 if (visible || size.dataChanged) {
1384                     // when data is changed, all items must be kept visible, as their heights must be measured
1385                     if (item.hidden) {
1386                         item.hidden = false;
1387                         domItem.style.display = '';
1388                     }
1389                     domItem.style.top = item.top + "px";
1390                     domItem.style.left = (left - item.dotWidth / 2) + "px";
1391 
1392                     domItem.content.style.marginLeft = (1.5 * item.dotWidth) + "px";
1393                     //domItem.content.style.marginRight = (0.5 * item.dotWidth) + "px"; // TODO
1394                     domItem.dot.style.top = ((item.height - item.dotHeight) / 2) + "px";
1395                 }
1396                 else {
1397                     // hide when outside of the current window
1398                     if (!item.hidden) {
1399                         domItem.style.display = 'none';
1400                         item.hidden = true;
1401                     }
1402                 }
1403                 break;
1404 
1405             default:
1406                 // do nothing
1407                 break;
1408         }
1409     }
1410 
1411     // move selected item to the end, to ensure that it is always on top
1412     if (this.selection) {
1413         var item = this.selection.item;
1414         frame.removeChild(item);
1415         frame.appendChild(item);
1416     }
1417 
1418     // put frame online again
1419     dom.content.appendChild(frame);
1420 
1421     /* TODO
1422      // retrieve all image sources from the items, and set a callback once 
1423      // all images are retrieved
1424      var urls = [];
1425      var timeline = this;
1426      links.Timeline.filterImageUrls(frame, urls);
1427      if (urls.length) {
1428      for (var i = 0; i < urls.length; i++) {
1429      var url = urls[i];
1430      var callback = function (url) {
1431      timeline.redraw();
1432      };
1433      var sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded = false;
1434      links.imageloader.load(url, callback, sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded);
1435      }
1436      }    
1437      */
1438 };
1439 
1440 
1441 /**
1442  * Create an event in the timeline, with (optional) formatting: inside a box
1443  * with rounded corners, and a vertical line+dot to the axis.
1444  * @param {Object} item         Item containing optional field className
1445  * @return {Element} dom        HTML Element containing box
1446  */
1447 links.Timeline.prototype.createEventBox = function(item) {
1448     // background box
1449     var divBox = document.createElement("DIV");
1450     divBox.style.position = "absolute";
1451     divBox.style.left  = "0px";
1452     divBox.style.top = "0px";
1453 
1454     // contents box (inside the background box). used for making margins
1455     var divContent = document.createElement("DIV");
1456     divContent.className = "timeline-event-content";
1457     divContent.innerHTML = item.content;
1458     divBox.appendChild(divContent);
1459 
1460     // line to axis
1461     var divLine = document.createElement("DIV");
1462     divLine.style.position = "absolute";
1463     divLine.style.width = "0px";
1464     // important: the vertical line is added at the front of the list of elements,
1465     // so it will be drawn behind all boxes and ranges
1466     divBox.line = divLine;
1467 
1468     // dot on axis
1469     var divDot = document.createElement("DIV");
1470     divDot.style.position = "absolute";
1471     divDot.style.width  = "0px";
1472     divDot.style.height = "0px";
1473     divBox.dot = divDot;
1474 
1475     return divBox;
1476 };

1499             links.Timeline.addClassName(divLine, item.className);
1500             links.Timeline.addClassName(divDot, item.className);
1501         }
1502 
1503         // TODO: apply selected className?
1504     }
1505 };

1601 /**
1602  * Redraw the group labels
1603  */
1604 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawGroups = function() {
1605     var dom = this.dom,
1606         options = this.options,
1607         size = this.size,
1608         groups = this.groups;
1609 
1610     if (dom.groups === undefined) {
1611         dom.groups = {};
1612     }
1613 
1614     var labels = dom.groups.labels;
1615     if (!labels) {
1616         labels = [];
1617         dom.groups.labels = labels;
1618     }
1619     var labelLines = dom.groups.labelLines;
1620     if (!labelLines) {
1621         labelLines = [];
1622         dom.groups.labelLines = labelLines;
1623     }
1624     var itemLines = dom.groups.itemLines;
1625     if (!itemLines) {
1626         itemLines = [];
1627         dom.groups.itemLines = itemLines;
1628     }
1629 
1630     // create the frame for holding the groups
1631     var frame = dom.groups.frame;
1632     if (!frame) {
1633         frame =  document.createElement("DIV");
1634         frame.className = "timeline-groups-axis";
1635         frame.style.position = "absolute";
1636         frame.style.overflow = "hidden";
1637         frame.style.top = "0px";
1638         frame.style.height = "100%";
1639 
1640         dom.frame.appendChild(frame);
1641         dom.groups.frame = frame;
1642     }
1643 
1644     frame.style.left = size.groupsLeft + "px";
1645     frame.style.width = (options.groupsWidth !== undefined) ?
1646         options.groupsWidth :
1647         size.groupsWidth + "px";
1648 
1649     // hide groups axis when there are no groups
1650     if (groups.length == 0) {
1651         frame.style.display = 'none';
1652     }
1653     else {
1654         frame.style.display = '';
1655     }
1656 
1657     if (size.dataChanged) {
1658         // create the items
1659         var current = labels.length,
1660             needed = groups.length;
1661 
1662         // overwrite existing items
1663         for (var i = 0, iMax = Math.min(current, needed); i < iMax; i++) {
1664             var group = groups[i];
1665             var label = labels[i];
1666             label.innerHTML = this.getGroupName(group);
1667             label.style.display = '';
1668         }
1669 
1670         // append new items when needed
1671         for (var i = current; i < needed; i++) {
1672             var group = groups[i];
1673 
1674             // create text label
1675             var label = document.createElement("DIV");
1676             label.className = "timeline-groups-text";
1677             label.style.position = "absolute";
1678             if (options.groupsWidth === undefined) {
1679                 label.style.whiteSpace = "nowrap";
1680             }
1681             label.innerHTML = this.getGroupName(group);
1682             frame.appendChild(label);
1683             labels[i] = label;
1684 
1685             // create the grid line between the group labels
1686             var labelLine = document.createElement("DIV");
1687             labelLine.className = "timeline-axis-grid timeline-axis-grid-minor";
1688             labelLine.style.position = "absolute";
1689             labelLine.style.left = "0px";
1690             labelLine.style.width = "100%";
1691             labelLine.style.height = "0px";
1692             labelLine.style.borderTopStyle = "solid";
1693             frame.appendChild(labelLine);
1694             labelLines[i] = labelLine;
1695 
1696             // create the grid line between the items
1697             var itemLine = document.createElement("DIV");
1698             itemLine.className = "timeline-axis-grid timeline-axis-grid-minor";
1699             itemLine.style.position = "absolute";
1700             itemLine.style.left = "0px";
1701             itemLine.style.width = "100%";
1702             itemLine.style.height = "0px";
1703             itemLine.style.borderTopStyle = "solid";
1704             dom.content.insertBefore(itemLine, dom.content.firstChild);
1705             itemLines[i] = itemLine;
1706         }
1707 
1708         // remove redundant items from the DOM when needed
1709         for (var i = needed; i < current; i++) {
1710             var label = labels[i],
1711                 labelLine = labelLines[i],
1712                 itemLine = itemLines[i];
1713 
1714             frame.removeChild(label);
1715             frame.removeChild(labelLine);
1716             dom.content.removeChild(itemLine);
1717         }
1718         labels.splice(needed, current - needed);
1719         labelLines.splice(needed, current - needed);
1720         itemLines.splice(needed, current - needed);
1721 
1722         frame.style.borderStyle = options.groupsOnRight ?
1723             "none none none solid" :
1724             "none solid none none";
1725     }
1726 
1727     // position the groups
1728     for (var i = 0, iMax = groups.length; i < iMax; i++) {
1729         var group = groups[i],
1730             label = labels[i],
1731             labelLine = labelLines[i],
1732             itemLine = itemLines[i];
1733 
1734         label.style.top = group.labelTop + "px";
1735         labelLine.style.top = group.lineTop + "px";
1736         itemLine.style.top = group.lineTop + "px";
1737         itemLine.style.width = size.contentWidth + "px";
1738     }
1739 
1740     if (!dom.groups.background) {
1741         // create the axis grid line background
1742         var background = document.createElement("DIV");
1743         background.className = "timeline-axis";
1744         background.style.position = "absolute";
1745         background.style.left = "0px";
1746         background.style.width = "100%";
1747         background.style.border = "none";
1748 
1749         frame.appendChild(background);
1750         dom.groups.background = background;
1751     }
1752     dom.groups.background.style.top = size.axis.top + 'px';
1753     dom.groups.background.style.height = size.axis.height + 'px';
1754 
1755     if (!dom.groups.line) {
1756         // create the axis grid line
1757         var line = document.createElement("DIV");
1758         line.className = "timeline-axis";
1759         line.style.position = "absolute";
1760         line.style.left = "0px";
1761         line.style.width = "100%";
1762         line.style.height = "0px";
1763 
1764         frame.appendChild(line);
1765         dom.groups.line = line;
1766     }
1767     dom.groups.line.style.top = size.axis.line + 'px';
1768 };

1771 /**
1772  * Redraw the current time bar
1773  */
1774 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawCurrentTime = function() {
1775     var options = this.options,
1776         dom = this.dom,
1777         size = this.size;
1778 
1779     if (!options.showCurrentTime) {
1780         if (dom.currentTime) {
1781             dom.contentTimelines.removeChild(dom.currentTime);
1782             delete dom.currentTime;
1783         }
1784 
1785         return;
1786     }
1787 
1788     if (!dom.currentTime) {
1789         // create the current time bar
1790         var currentTime = document.createElement("DIV");
1791         currentTime.className = "timeline-currenttime";
1792         currentTime.style.position = "absolute";
1793         currentTime.style.top = "0px";
1794         currentTime.style.height = "100%";
1795 
1796         dom.contentTimelines.appendChild(currentTime);
1797         dom.currentTime = currentTime;
1798     }
1799 
1800     var now = new Date();
1801     var nowOffset = new Date(now.getTime() + this.clientTimeOffset);
1802     var x = this.timeToScreen(nowOffset);
1803 
1804     var visible = (x > -size.contentWidth && x < 2 * size.contentWidth);
1805     dom.currentTime.style.display = visible ? '' : 'none';
1806     dom.currentTime.style.left = x + "px";
1807     dom.currentTime.title = "Current time: " + nowOffset;
1808 
1809     // start a timer to adjust for the new time
1810     if (this.currentTimeTimer != undefined) {
1811         clearTimeout(this.currentTimeTimer);
1812         delete this.currentTimeTimer;
1813     }
1814     var timeline = this;
1815     var onTimeout = function() {
1816         timeline.redrawCurrentTime();
1817     };
1818     // the time equal to the width of one pixel, divided by 2 for more smoothness
1819     var interval = 1 / this.conversion.factor / 2;
1820     if (interval < 30) interval = 30;
1821     this.currentTimeTimer = setTimeout(onTimeout, interval);
1822 };
1823 
1824 /**
1825  * Redraw the custom time bar
1826  */
1827 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawCustomTime = function() {
1828     var options = this.options,
1829         dom = this.dom,
1830         size = this.size;
1831 
1832     if (!options.showCustomTime) {
1833         if (dom.customTime) {
1834             dom.contentTimelines.removeChild(dom.customTime);
1835             delete dom.customTime;
1836         }
1837 
1838         return;
1839     }
1840 
1841     if (!dom.customTime) {
1842         var customTime = document.createElement("DIV");
1843         customTime.className = "timeline-customtime";
1844         customTime.style.position = "absolute";
1845         customTime.style.top = "0px";
1846         customTime.style.height = "100%";
1847 
1848         var drag = document.createElement("DIV");
1849         drag.style.position = "relative";
1850         drag.style.top = "0px";
1851         drag.style.left = "-10px";
1852         drag.style.height = "100%";
1853         drag.style.width = "20px";
1854         customTime.appendChild(drag);
1855 
1856         dom.contentTimelines.appendChild(customTime);
1857         dom.customTime = customTime;
1858 
1859         // initialize parameter
1860         this.customTime = new Date();
1861     }
1862 
1863     var x = this.timeToScreen(this.customTime),
1864         visible = (x > -size.contentWidth && x < 2 * size.contentWidth);
1865     dom.customTime.style.display = visible ? '' : 'none';
1866     dom.customTime.style.left = x + "px";
1867     dom.customTime.title = "Time: " + this.customTime;
1868 };

1871 /**
1872  * Redraw the delete button, on the top right of the currently selected item
1873  * if there is no item selected, the button is hidden.
1874  */
1875 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawDeleteButton = function () {
1876     var timeline = this,
1877         options = this.options,
1878         dom = this.dom,
1879         size = this.size,
1880         frame = dom.items.frame;
1881 
1882     if (!options.editable) {
1883         return;
1884     }
1885 
1886     var deleteButton = dom.items.deleteButton;
1887     if (!deleteButton) {
1888         // create a delete button
1889         deleteButton = document.createElement("DIV");
1890         deleteButton.className = "timeline-navigation-delete";
1891         deleteButton.style.position = "absolute";
1892 
1893         frame.appendChild(deleteButton);
1894         dom.items.deleteButton = deleteButton;
1895     }
1896 
1897     if (this.selection) {
1898         var index = this.selection.index,
1899             item = this.items[index],
1900             domItem = this.selection.item,
1901             right,
1902             top = item.top;
1903 
1904         switch (item.type) {
1905             case 'range':
1906                 right = this.timeToScreen(item.end);
1907                 break;
1908 
1909             case 'box':
1910                 //right = this.timeToScreen(item.start) + item.width / 2 + item.borderWidth; // TODO: borderWidth
1911                 right = this.timeToScreen(item.start) + item.width / 2;
1912                 break;
1913 
1914             case 'dot':
1915                 right = this.timeToScreen(item.start) + item.width;
1916                 break;
1917         }
1918 
1919         // limit the position
1920         if (right < -size.contentWidth) {
1921             right = -size.contentWidth;
1922         }
1923         if (right > 2 * size.contentWidth) {
1924             right = 2 * size.contentWidth;
1925         }
1926 
1927         deleteButton.style.left = right + 'px';
1928         deleteButton.style.top = top + 'px';
1929         deleteButton.style.display = '';
1930         frame.removeChild(deleteButton);
1931         frame.appendChild(deleteButton);
1932     }
1933     else {
1934         deleteButton.style.display = 'none';
1935     }
1936 };

1939 /**
1940  * Redraw the drag areas. When an item (ranges only) is selected,
1941  * it gets a drag area on the left and right side, to change its width
1942  */
1943 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawDragAreas = function () {
1944     var timeline = this,
1945         options = this.options,
1946         dom = this.dom,
1947         size = this.size,
1948         frame = this.dom.items.frame;
1949 
1950     if (!options.editable) {
1951         return;
1952     }
1953 
1954     // create left drag area
1955     var dragLeft = dom.items.dragLeft;
1956     if (!dragLeft) {
1957         dragLeft = document.createElement("DIV");
1958         dragLeft.className="timeline-event-range-drag-left";
1959         dragLeft.style.width = options.dragAreaWidth + "px";
1960         dragLeft.style.position = "absolute";
1961 
1962         frame.appendChild(dragLeft);
1963         dom.items.dragLeft = dragLeft;
1964     }
1965 
1966     // create right drag area
1967     var dragRight = dom.items.dragRight;
1968     if (!dragRight) {
1969         dragRight = document.createElement("DIV");
1970         dragRight.className="timeline-event-range-drag-right";
1971         dragRight.style.width = options.dragAreaWidth + "px";
1972         dragRight.style.position = "absolute";
1973 
1974         frame.appendChild(dragRight);
1975         dom.items.dragRight = dragRight;
1976     }
1977 
1978     // reposition left and right drag area
1979     if (this.selection) {
1980         var index = this.selection.index,
1981             item = this.items[index];
1982 
1983         if (item.type == 'range') {
1984             var domItem = item.dom,
1985                 left = this.timeToScreen(item.start),
1986                 right = this.timeToScreen(item.end),
1987                 top = item.top,
1988                 height = item.height;
1989 
1990             dragLeft.style.left = left + 'px';
1991             dragLeft.style.top = top + 'px';
1992             dragLeft.style.height = height + 'px';
1993             dragLeft.style.display = '';
1994             frame.removeChild(dragLeft);
1995             frame.appendChild(dragLeft);
1996 
1997             dragRight.style.left = (right - options.dragAreaWidth) + 'px';
1998             dragRight.style.top = top + 'px';
1999             dragRight.style.height = height + 'px';
2000             dragRight.style.display = '';
2001             frame.removeChild(dragRight);
2002             frame.appendChild(dragRight);
2003         }
2004     }
2005     else {
2006         dragLeft.style.display = 'none';
2007         dragRight.style.display = 'none';
2008     }
2009 };

2013 /**
2014  * Create the navigation buttons for zooming and moving
2015  */
2016 links.Timeline.prototype.redrawNavigation = function () {
2017     var timeline = this,
2018         options = this.options,
2019         dom = this.dom,
2020         frame = dom.frame,
2021         navBar = dom.navBar;
2022 
2023     if (!navBar) {
2024         if (options.editable || options.showNavigation) {
2025             // create a navigation bar containing the navigation buttons
2026             navBar = document.createElement("DIV");
2027             navBar.style.position = "absolute";
2028             navBar.className = "timeline-navigation";
2029             if (options.groupsOnRight) {
2030                 navBar.style.left = '10px';
2031             }
2032             else {
2033                 navBar.style.right = '10px';
2034             }
2035             if (options.axisOnTop) {
2036                 navBar.style.bottom = '10px';
2037             }
2038             else {
2039                 navBar.style.top = '10px';
2040             }
2041             dom.navBar = navBar;
2042             frame.appendChild(navBar);
2043         }
2044 
2045         if (options.editable && options.showButtonAdd) {
2046             // create a new in button
2047             navBar.addButton = document.createElement("DIV");
2048             navBar.addButton.className = "timeline-navigation-new";
2049 
2050             navBar.addButton.title = "Create new event";
2051             var onAdd = function(event) {
2052                 links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2053                 links.Timeline.stopPropagation(event);
2054 
2055                 // create a new event at the center of the frame
2056                 var w = timeline.size.contentWidth;
2057                 var x = w / 2;
2058                 var xstart = timeline.screenToTime(x - w / 10); // subtract 10% of timeline width
2059                 var xend = timeline.screenToTime(x + w / 10); // add 10% of timeline width
2060                 if (options.snapEvents) {
2061                     timeline.step.snap(xstart);
2062                     timeline.step.snap(xend);
2063                 }
2064 
2065                 var content = "New";
2066                 var group = timeline.groups.length ? timeline.groups[0].content : undefined;
2067 
2068                 timeline.addItem({
2069                     'start': xstart,
2070                     'end': xend,
2071                     'content': content,
2072                     'group': group
2073                 });
2074                 var index = (timeline.items.length - 1);
2075                 timeline.selectItem(index);
2076 
2077                 timeline.applyAdd = true;
2078 
2079                 // fire an add event. 
2080                 // Note that the change can be canceled from within an event listener if 
2081                 // this listener calls the method cancelAdd().
2082                 timeline.trigger('add');
2083 
2084                 if (!timeline.applyAdd) {
2085                     // undo an add
2086                     timeline.deleteItem(index);
2087                 }
2088                 timeline.redrawDeleteButton();
2089                 timeline.redrawDragAreas();
2090             };
2091             links.Timeline.addEventListener(navBar.addButton, "mousedown", onAdd);
2092             navBar.appendChild(navBar.addButton);
2093         }
2094 
2095         if (options.editable && options.showButtonAdd && options.showNavigation) {
2096             // create a separator line
2097             navBar.addButton.style.borderRightWidth = "1px";
2098             navBar.addButton.style.borderRightStyle = "solid";
2099         }
2100 
2101         if (options.showNavigation) {
2102             // create a zoom in button
2103             navBar.zoomInButton = document.createElement("DIV");
2104             navBar.zoomInButton.className = "timeline-navigation-zoom-in";
2105             navBar.zoomInButton.title = "Zoom in";
2106             var onZoomIn = function(event) {
2107                 links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2108                 links.Timeline.stopPropagation(event);
2109                 timeline.zoom(0.4);
2110                 timeline.trigger("rangechange");
2111                 timeline.trigger("rangechanged");
2112             };
2113             links.Timeline.addEventListener(navBar.zoomInButton, "mousedown", onZoomIn);
2114             navBar.appendChild(navBar.zoomInButton);
2115 
2116             // create a zoom out button
2117             navBar.zoomOutButton = document.createElement("DIV");
2118             navBar.zoomOutButton.className = "timeline-navigation-zoom-out";
2119             navBar.zoomOutButton.title = "Zoom out";
2120             var onZoomOut = function(event) {
2121                 links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2122                 links.Timeline.stopPropagation(event);
2123                 timeline.zoom(-0.4);
2124                 timeline.trigger("rangechange");
2125                 timeline.trigger("rangechanged");
2126             };
2127             links.Timeline.addEventListener(navBar.zoomOutButton, "mousedown", onZoomOut);
2128             navBar.appendChild(navBar.zoomOutButton);
2129 
2130             // create a move left button
2131             navBar.moveLeftButton = document.createElement("DIV");
2132             navBar.moveLeftButton.className = "timeline-navigation-move-left";
2133             navBar.moveLeftButton.title = "Move left";
2134             var onMoveLeft = function(event) {
2135                 links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2136                 links.Timeline.stopPropagation(event);
2137                 timeline.move(-0.2);
2138                 timeline.trigger("rangechange");
2139                 timeline.trigger("rangechanged");
2140             };
2141             links.Timeline.addEventListener(navBar.moveLeftButton, "mousedown", onMoveLeft);
2142             navBar.appendChild(navBar.moveLeftButton);
2143 
2144             // create a move right button
2145             navBar.moveRightButton = document.createElement("DIV");
2146             navBar.moveRightButton.className = "timeline-navigation-move-right";
2147             navBar.moveRightButton.title = "Move right";
2148             var onMoveRight = function(event) {
2149                 links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2150                 links.Timeline.stopPropagation(event);
2151                 timeline.move(0.2);
2152                 timeline.trigger("rangechange");
2153                 timeline.trigger("rangechanged");
2154             };
2155             links.Timeline.addEventListener(navBar.moveRightButton, "mousedown", onMoveRight);
2156             navBar.appendChild(navBar.moveRightButton);
2157         }
2158     }
2159 };

2240 /**
2241  * Check if the timeline is resized, and if so, redraw the timeline.
2242  * Useful when the webpage is resized.
2243  */
2244 links.Timeline.prototype.checkResize = function() {
2245     var resized = this.recalcSize();
2246     if (resized) {
2247         this.redrawFrame();
2248     }
