2251 /**
2252  * Recursively retrieve all image urls from the images located inside a given
2253  * HTML element
2254  * @param {HTMLElement} elem
2255  * @param {String[]} urls   Urls will be added here (no duplicates)
2256  */
2257 links.Timeline.filterImageUrls = function(elem, urls) {
2258     var child = elem.firstChild;
2259     while (child) {
2260         if (child.tagName == 'IMG') {
2261             var url = child.src;
2262             if (urls.indexOf(url) == -1) {
2263                 urls.push(url);
2264             }
2265         }
2266 
2267         links.Timeline.filterImageUrls(child, urls);
2268 
2269         child = child.nextSibling;
2270     }
2271 };
2272 
2273 /**
2274  * Recalculate the sizes of all frames, groups, items, axis
2275  * After recalcSize() is executed, the Timeline should be redrawn normally
2276  *
2277  * @return {boolean} resized   Returns true when the timeline has been resized
2278  */
2279 links.Timeline.prototype.recalcSize = function() {
2280     var resized = false;
2281 
2282     var timeline = this,
2283         size = this.size,
2284         options = this.options,
2285         axisOnTop = options.axisOnTop,
2286         dom = this.dom,
2287         axis = dom.axis,
2288         groups = this.groups,
2289         labels = dom.groups.labels,
2290         items = this.items;
2291 
2292     var groupsWidth = size.groupsWidth,
2293         characterMinorWidth  = axis.characterMinor ? axis.characterMinor.clientWidth : 0,
2294         characterMinorHeight = axis.characterMinor ? axis.characterMinor.clientHeight : 0,
2295         characterMajorWidth  = axis.characterMajor ? axis.characterMajor.clientWidth : 0,
2296         characterMajorHeight = axis.characterMajor ? axis.characterMajor.clientHeight : 0,
2297         axisHeight = (options.showMinorLabels ? characterMinorHeight : 0) +
2298             (options.showMajorLabels ? characterMajorHeight : 0),
2299         actualHeight = size.actualHeight || axisHeight;
2300 
2301     // TODO: move checking for loaded items when creating the dom
2302     if (size.dataChanged) {
2303         // retrieve all image sources from the items, and set a callback once 
2304         // all images are retrieved
2305         var urls = [];
2306         for (var i = 0, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
2307             var item = items[i],
2308                 domItem = item.dom;
2309 
2310             if (domItem) {
2311                 links.Timeline.filterImageUrls(domItem, urls);
2312             }
2313         }
2314         if (urls.length) {
2315             for (var i = 0; i < urls.length; i++) {
2316                 var url = urls[i];
2317                 var callback = function (url) {
2318                     timeline.redraw();
2319                 };
2320                 var sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded = false;
2321                 links.imageloader.load(url, callback, sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded);
2322             }
2323         }
2324     }
2325 
2326     // check sizes of the items and groups (width and height) when the data is changed
2327     if (size.dataChanged) { // TODO: always calculate the size of an item?
2328         //if (true) {
2329         groupsWidth = 0;
2330 
2331         // loop through all groups to get the maximum width and the heights
2332         for (var i = 0, iMax = labels.length; i < iMax; i++) {
2333             var group = groups[i];
2334             group.width = labels[i].clientWidth;
2335             group.height = labels[i].clientHeight;
2336             group.labelHeight = group.height;
2337 
2338             groupsWidth = Math.max(groupsWidth, group.width);
2339         }
2340 
2341         // loop through the width and height of all items
2342         for (var i = 0, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
2343             var item = items[i],
2344                 domItem = item.dom,
2345                 group = item.group;
2346 
2347             var width = domItem ? domItem.clientWidth : 0;
2348             var height = domItem ? domItem.clientHeight : 0;
2349             resized = resized || (item.width != width);
2350             resized = resized || (item.height != height);
2351             item.width = width;
2352             item.height = height;
2353             //item.borderWidth = (domItem.offsetWidth - domItem.clientWidth - 2) / 2; // TODO: borderWidth
2354 
2355             switch (item.type) {
2356                 case 'range':
2357                     break;
2358 
2359                 case 'box':
2360                     item.dotHeight = domItem.dot.offsetHeight;
2361                     item.dotWidth = domItem.dot.offsetWidth;
2362                     item.lineWidth = domItem.line.offsetWidth;
2363                     break;
2364 
2365                 case 'dot':
2366                     item.dotHeight = domItem.dot.offsetHeight;
2367                     item.dotWidth = domItem.dot.offsetWidth;
2368                     item.contentHeight = domItem.content.offsetHeight;
2369                     break;
2370             }
2371 
2372             if (group) {
2373                 group.height = group.height ? Math.max(group.height, item.height) : item.height;
2374             }
2375         }
2376 
2377         // calculate the actual height of the timeline (needed for auto sizing
2378         // the timeline)
2379         actualHeight = axisHeight + 2 * options.eventMarginAxis;
2380         for (var i = 0, iMax = groups.length; i < iMax; i++) {
2381             actualHeight += groups[i].height + options.eventMargin;
2382         }
2383     }
2384 
2385     // calculate actual height of the timeline when there are no groups
2386     // but stacked items
2387     if (groups.length == 0 && options.autoHeight) {
2388         var min = 0,
2389             max = 0;
2390 
2391         if (this.animation && this.animation.finalItems) {
2392             // adjust the offset of all finalItems when the actualHeight has been changed
2393             var finalItems = this.animation.finalItems,
2394                 finalItem = finalItems[0];
2395             if (finalItem && finalItem.top) {
2396                 min = finalItem.top;
2397                 max = finalItem.top + finalItem.height;
2398             }
2399             for (var i = 1, iMax = finalItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
2400                 finalItem = finalItems[i];
2401                 min = Math.min(min, finalItem.top);
2402                 max = Math.max(max, finalItem.top + finalItem.height);
2403             }
2404         }
2405         else {
2406             var item = items[0];
2407             if (item && item.top) {
2408                 min = item.top;
2409                 max = item.top + item.height;
2410             }
2411             for (var i = 1, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
2412                 var item = items[i];
2413                 if (item.top) {
2414                     min = Math.min(min, item.top);
2415                     max = Math.max(max, (item.top + item.height));
2416                 }
2417             }
2418         }
2419 
2420         actualHeight = (max - min) + 2 * options.eventMarginAxis + axisHeight;
2421 
2422         if (size.actualHeight != actualHeight && options.autoHeight && !options.axisOnTop) {
2423             // adjust the offset of all items when the actualHeight has been changed
2424             var diff = actualHeight - size.actualHeight;
2425             if (this.animation && this.animation.finalItems) {
2426                 var finalItems = this.animation.finalItems;
2427                 for (var i = 0, iMax = finalItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
2428                     finalItems[i].top += diff;
2429                     finalItems[i].item.top += diff;
2430                 }
2431             }
2432             else {
2433                 for (var i = 0, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
2434                     items[i].top += diff;
2435                 }
2436             }
2437         }
2438     }
2439 
2440     // now the heights of the elements are known, we can calculate the the 
2441     // width and height of frame and axis and content 
2442     // Note: IE7 has issues with giving frame.clientWidth, therefore I use offsetWidth instead
2443     var frameWidth  = dom.frame ? dom.frame.offsetWidth : 0,
2444         frameHeight = Math.max(options.autoHeight ?
2445             actualHeight : (dom.frame ? dom.frame.clientHeight : 0),
2446             options.minHeight),
2447         axisTop  = axisOnTop ? 0 : frameHeight - axisHeight,
2448         axisLine = axisOnTop ? axisHeight : axisTop,
2449         itemsTop = axisOnTop ? axisHeight : 0,
2450         contentHeight = Math.max(frameHeight - axisHeight, 0);
2451 
2452     if (options.groupsWidth !== undefined) {
2453         groupsWidth = dom.groups.frame ? dom.groups.frame.clientWidth : 0;
2454     }
2455     var groupsLeft = options.groupsOnRight ? frameWidth - groupsWidth : 0;
2456 
2457     if (size.dataChanged) {
2458         // calculate top positions of the group labels and lines
2459         var eventMargin = options.eventMargin,
2460             top = axisOnTop ?
2461                 options.eventMarginAxis + eventMargin/2 :
2462                 contentHeight - options.eventMarginAxis + eventMargin/2;
2463 
2464         for (var i = 0, iMax = groups.length; i < iMax; i++) {
2465             var group = groups[i];
2466             if (axisOnTop) {
2467                 group.top = top;
2468                 group.labelTop = top + axisHeight + (group.height - group.labelHeight) / 2;
2469                 group.lineTop = top + axisHeight + group.height + eventMargin/2;
2470                 top += group.height + eventMargin;
2471             }
2472             else {
2473                 top -= group.height + eventMargin;
2474                 group.top = top;
2475                 group.labelTop = top + (group.height - group.labelHeight) / 2;
2476                 group.lineTop = top - eventMargin/2;
2477             }
2478         }
2479 
2480         // calculate top position of the items
2481         for (var i = 0, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
2482             var item = items[i],
2483                 group = item.group;
2484 
2485             if (group) {
2486                 item.top = group.top;
2487             }
2488         }
2489 
2490         resized = true;
2491     }
2492 
2493     resized = resized || (size.groupsWidth !== groupsWidth);
2494     resized = resized || (size.groupsLeft !== groupsLeft);
2495     resized = resized || (size.actualHeight !== actualHeight);
2496     size.groupsWidth = groupsWidth;
2497     size.groupsLeft = groupsLeft;
2498     size.actualHeight = actualHeight;
2499 
2500     resized = resized || (size.frameWidth !== frameWidth);
2501     resized = resized || (size.frameHeight !== frameHeight);
2502     size.frameWidth = frameWidth;
2503     size.frameHeight = frameHeight;
2504 
2505     resized = resized || (size.groupsWidth !== groupsWidth);
2506     size.groupsWidth = groupsWidth;
2507     size.contentLeft = options.groupsOnRight ? 0 : groupsWidth;
2508     size.contentWidth = Math.max(frameWidth - groupsWidth, 0);
2509     size.contentHeight = contentHeight;
2510 
2511     resized = resized || (size.axis.top !== axisTop);
2512     resized = resized || (size.axis.line !== axisLine);
2513     resized = resized || (size.axis.height !== axisHeight);
2514     resized = resized || (size.items.top !== itemsTop);
2515     size.axis.top = axisTop;
2516     size.axis.line = axisLine;
2517     size.axis.height = axisHeight;
2518     size.axis.labelMajorTop = options.axisOnTop ? 0 : axisLine +
2519         (options.showMinorLabels ? characterMinorHeight : 0);
2520     size.axis.labelMinorTop = options.axisOnTop ?
2521         (options.showMajorLabels ? characterMajorHeight : 0) :
2522         axisLine;
2523     size.axis.lineMinorTop = options.axisOnTop ? size.axis.labelMinorTop : 0;
2524     size.axis.lineMinorHeight = options.showMajorLabels ?
2525         frameHeight - characterMajorHeight:
2526         frameHeight;
2527     size.axis.lineMinorWidth = dom.axis.minorLines.length ?
2528         dom.axis.minorLines[0].offsetWidth : 1;
2529     size.axis.lineMajorWidth = dom.axis.majorLines.length ?
2530         dom.axis.majorLines[0].offsetWidth : 1;
2531 
2532     size.items.top = itemsTop;
2533 
2534     resized = resized || (size.axis.characterMinorWidth  !== characterMinorWidth);
2535     resized = resized || (size.axis.characterMinorHeight !== characterMinorHeight);
2536     resized = resized || (size.axis.characterMajorWidth  !== characterMajorWidth);
2537     resized = resized || (size.axis.characterMajorHeight !== characterMajorHeight);
2538     size.axis.characterMinorWidth  = characterMinorWidth;
2539     size.axis.characterMinorHeight = characterMinorHeight;
2540     size.axis.characterMajorWidth  = characterMajorWidth;
2541     size.axis.characterMajorHeight = characterMajorHeight;
2542 
2543     // conversion factors can be changed when width of the Timeline is changed,
2544     // and when start or end are changed
2545     this.recalcConversion();
2546 
2547     return resized;
2548 };
2549

2551 
2552 /**
2553  * Calculate the factor and offset to convert a position on screen to the
2554  * corresponding date and vice versa.
2555  * After the method calcConversionFactor is executed once, the methods screenToTime and
2556  * timeToScreen can be used.
2557  */
2558 links.Timeline.prototype.recalcConversion = function() {
2559     this.conversion.offset = parseFloat(this.start.valueOf());
2560     this.conversion.factor = parseFloat(this.size.contentWidth) /
2561         parseFloat(this.end.valueOf() - this.start.valueOf());
2562 };
2563 
2564 
2565 /**
2566  * Convert a position on screen (pixels) to a datetime
2567  * Before this method can be used, the method calcConversionFactor must be
2568  * executed once.
2569  * @param {int}     x    Position on the screen in pixels
2570  * @return {Date}   time The datetime the corresponds with given position x
2571  */
2572 links.Timeline.prototype.screenToTime = function(x) {
2573     var conversion = this.conversion,
2574         time = new Date(parseFloat(x) / conversion.factor + conversion.offset);
2575     return time;
2576 };
2577 
2578 /**
2579  * Convert a datetime (Date object) into a position on the screen
2580  * Before this method can be used, the method calcConversionFactor must be
2581  * executed once.
2582  * @param {Date}   time A date
2583  * @return {int}   x    The position on the screen in pixels which corresponds
2584  *                      with the given date.
2585  */
2586 links.Timeline.prototype.timeToScreen = function(time) {
2587     var conversion = this.conversion;
2588     var x = (time.valueOf() - conversion.offset) * conversion.factor;
2589     return x;
2590 };

2594 /**
2595  * Event handler for touchstart event on mobile devices
2596  */
2597 links.Timeline.prototype.onTouchStart = function(event) {
2598     var params = this.eventParams,
2599         me = this;
2600 
2601     if (params.touchDown) {
2602         // if already moving, return
2603         return;
2604     }
2605 
2606     params.touchDown = true;
2607     params.zoomed = false;
2608 
2609     this.onMouseDown(event);
2610 
2611     if (!params.onTouchMove) {
2612         params.onTouchMove = function (event) {me.onTouchMove(event);};
2613         links.Timeline.addEventListener(document, "touchmove", params.onTouchMove);
2614     }
2615     if (!params.onTouchEnd) {
2616         params.onTouchEnd  = function (event) {me.onTouchEnd(event);};
2617         links.Timeline.addEventListener(document, "touchend",  params.onTouchEnd);
2618     }
2619 
2620     /* TODO
2621     // check for double tap event
2622     var delta = 500; // ms
2623     var doubleTapStart = (new Date()).getTime();
2624     var target = links.Timeline.getTarget(event);
2625     var doubleTapItem = this.getItemIndex(target);
2626     if (params.doubleTapStart &&
2627             (doubleTapStart - params.doubleTapStart) < delta &&
2628             doubleTapItem == params.doubleTapItem) {
2629         delete params.doubleTapStart;
2630         delete params.doubleTapItem;
2631         me.onDblClick(event);
2632         params.touchDown = false;
2633     }
2634     params.doubleTapStart = doubleTapStart;
2635     params.doubleTapItem = doubleTapItem;
2636     */
2637     // store timing for double taps
2638     var target = links.Timeline.getTarget(event);
2639     var item = this.getItemIndex(target);
2640     params.doubleTapStartPrev = params.doubleTapStart;
2641     params.doubleTapStart = (new Date()).getTime();
2642     params.doubleTapItemPrev = params.doubleTapItem;
2643     params.doubleTapItem = item;
2644 
2645     links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2646 };
2647 
2648 /**
2649  * Event handler for touchmove event on mobile devices
2650  */
2651 links.Timeline.prototype.onTouchMove = function(event) {
2652     var params = this.eventParams;
2653 
2654     if (event.scale && event.scale !== 1) {
2655         params.zoomed = true;
2656     }
2657 
2658     if (!params.zoomed) {
2659         // move 
2660         this.onMouseMove(event);
2661     }
2662     else {
2663         if (this.options.zoomable) {
2664             // pinch
2665             // TODO: pinch only supported on iPhone/iPad. Create something manually for Android?
2666             params.zoomed = true;
2667 
2668             var scale = event.scale,
2669                 oldWidth = (params.end.valueOf() - params.start.valueOf()),
2670                 newWidth = oldWidth / scale,
2671                 diff = newWidth - oldWidth,
2672                 start = new Date(parseInt(params.start.valueOf() - diff/2)),
2673                 end = new Date(parseInt(params.end.valueOf() + diff/2));
2674 
2675             // TODO: determine zoom-around-date from touch positions?
2676 
2677             this.setVisibleChartRange(start, end);
2678             this.trigger("rangechange");
2679         }
2680     }
2681 
2682     links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2683 };
2684 
2685 /**
2686  * Event handler for touchend event on mobile devices
2687  */
2688 links.Timeline.prototype.onTouchEnd = function(event) {
2689     var params = this.eventParams;
2690     var me = this;
2691     params.touchDown = false;
2692 
2693     if (params.zoomed) {
2694         this.trigger("rangechanged");
2695     }
2696 
2697     if (params.onTouchMove) {
2698         links.Timeline.removeEventListener(document, "touchmove", params.onTouchMove);
2699         delete params.onTouchMove;
2700 
2701     }
2702     if (params.onTouchEnd) {
2703         links.Timeline.removeEventListener(document, "touchend",  params.onTouchEnd);
2704         delete params.onTouchEnd;
2705     }
2706 
2707     this.onMouseUp(event);
2708 
2709     // check for double tap event
2710     var delta = 500; // ms
2711     var doubleTapEnd = (new Date()).getTime();
2712     var target = links.Timeline.getTarget(event);
2713     var doubleTapItem = this.getItemIndex(target);
2714     if (params.doubleTapStartPrev &&
2715         (doubleTapEnd - params.doubleTapStartPrev) < delta &&
2716         params.doubleTapItem == params.doubleTapItemPrev) {
2717         params.touchDown = true;
2718         me.onDblClick(event);
2719         params.touchDown = false;
2720     }
2721 
2722     links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2723 };
2724 
2725 
2726 /**
2727  * Start a moving operation inside the provided parent element
2728  * @param {event} event       The event that occurred (required for
2729  *                             retrieving the  mouse position)
2730  */
2731 links.Timeline.prototype.onMouseDown = function(event) {
2732     event = event || window.event;
2733 
2734     var params = this.eventParams,
2735         options = this.options,
2736         dom = this.dom;
2737 
2738     // only react on left mouse button down
2739     var leftButtonDown = event.which ? (event.which == 1) : (event.button == 1);
2740     if (!leftButtonDown && !params.touchDown) {
2741         return;
2742     }
2743 
2744     // check if frame is not resized (causing a mismatch with the end Date) 
2745     this.recalcSize();
2746 
2747     // get mouse position
2748     if (!params.touchDown) {
2749         params.mouseX = event.clientX;
2750         params.mouseY = event.clientY;
2751     }
2752     else {
2753         params.mouseX = event.targetTouches[0].clientX;
2754         params.mouseY = event.targetTouches[0].clientY;
2755     }
2756     if (params.mouseX === undefined) {params.mouseX = 0;}
2757     if (params.mouseY === undefined) {params.mouseY = 0;}
2758     params.frameLeft = links.Timeline.getAbsoluteLeft(this.dom.content);
2759     params.frameTop = links.Timeline.getAbsoluteTop(this.dom.content);
2760     params.previousLeft = 0;
2761     params.previousOffset = 0;
2762 
2763     params.moved = false;
2764     params.start = new Date(this.start);
2765     params.end = new Date(this.end);
2766 
2767     params.target = links.Timeline.getTarget(event);
2768     params.itemDragLeft = (params.target === this.dom.items.dragLeft);
2769     params.itemDragRight = (params.target === this.dom.items.dragRight);
2770 
2771     if (params.itemDragLeft || params.itemDragRight) {
2772         params.itemIndex = this.selection ? this.selection.index : undefined;
2773     }
2774     else {
2775         params.itemIndex = this.getItemIndex(params.target);
2776     }
2777 
2778     params.customTime = (params.target === dom.customTime ||
2779         params.target.parentNode === dom.customTime) ?
2780         this.customTime :
2781         undefined;
2782 
2783     params.addItem = (options.editable && event.ctrlKey);
2784     if (params.addItem) {
2785         // create a new event at the current mouse position
2786         var x = params.mouseX - params.frameLeft;
2787         var y = params.mouseY - params.frameTop;
2788 
2789         var xstart = this.screenToTime(x);
2790         if (options.snapEvents) {
2791             this.step.snap(xstart);
2792         }
2793         var xend = new Date(xstart);
2794         var content = "New";
2795         var group = this.getGroupFromHeight(y);
2796         this.addItem({
2797             'start': xstart,
2798             'end': xend,
2799             'content': content,
2800             'group': this.getGroupName(group)
2801         });
2802         params.itemIndex = (this.items.length - 1);
2803         this.selectItem(params.itemIndex);
2804         params.itemDragRight = true;
2805     }
2806 
2807     params.editItem = options.editable ? this.isSelected(params.itemIndex) : undefined;
2808     if (params.editItem) {
2809         var item = this.items[params.itemIndex];
2810         params.itemStart = item.start;
2811         params.itemEnd = item.end;
2812         params.itemGroup = item.group;
2813         params.itemType = item.type;
2814         if (params.itemType == 'range') {
2815             params.itemLeft = this.timeToScreen(item.start);
2816             params.itemRight = this.timeToScreen(item.end);
2817         }
2818         else {
2819             params.itemLeft = this.timeToScreen(item.start);
2820         }
2821     }
2822     else {
2823         this.dom.frame.style.cursor = 'move';
2824     }
2825     if (!params.touchDown) {
2826         // add event listeners to handle moving the contents
2827         // we store the function onmousemove and onmouseup in the timeline, so we can
2828         // remove the eventlisteners lateron in the function mouseUp()
2829         var me = this;
2830         if (!params.onMouseMove) {
2831             params.onMouseMove = function (event) {me.onMouseMove(event);};
2832             links.Timeline.addEventListener(document, "mousemove", params.onMouseMove);
2833         }
2834         if (!params.onMouseUp) {
2835             params.onMouseUp = function (event) {me.onMouseUp(event);};
2836             links.Timeline.addEventListener(document, "mouseup", params.onMouseUp);
2837         }
2838 
2839         links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
2840     }
2841 };

2844 /**
2845  * Perform moving operating.
2846  * This function activated from within the funcion links.Timeline.onMouseDown().
2847  * @param {event}   event  Well, eehh, the event
2848  */
2849 links.Timeline.prototype.onMouseMove = function (event) {
2850     event = event || window.event;
2851 
2852     var params = this.eventParams,
2853         size = this.size,
2854         dom = this.dom,
2855         options = this.options;
2856 
2857     // calculate change in mouse position
2858     var mouseX, mouseY;
2859     if (!params.touchDown) {
2860         mouseX = event.clientX;
2861         mouseY = event.clientY;
2862     }
2863     else {
2864         mouseX = event.targetTouches[0].clientX;
2865         mouseY = event.targetTouches[0].clientY;
2866     }
2867     if (mouseX === undefined) {mouseX = 0;}
2868     if (mouseY === undefined) {mouseY = 0;}
2869 
2870     if (params.mouseX === undefined) {
2871         params.mouseX = mouseX;
2872     }
2873     if (params.mouseY === undefined) {
2874         params.mouseY = mouseY;
2875     }
2876 
2877     var diffX = parseFloat(mouseX) - params.mouseX;
2878     var diffY = parseFloat(mouseY) - params.mouseY;
2879 
2880     // if mouse movement is big enough, register it as a "moved" event
2881     if (Math.abs(diffX) >= 1) {
2882         params.moved = true;
2883     }
2884 
2885     if (params.customTime) {
2886         var x = this.timeToScreen(params.customTime);
2887         var xnew = x + diffX;
2888         this.customTime = this.screenToTime(xnew);
2889         this.redrawCustomTime();
2890 
2891         // fire a timechange event
2892         this.trigger('timechange');
2893     }
2894     else if (params.editItem) {
2895         var item = this.items[params.itemIndex],
2896             domItem = item.dom,
2897             left,
2898             right;
2899 
2900         if (params.itemDragLeft) {
2901             // move the start of the item
2902             left = params.itemLeft + diffX;
2903             right = params.itemRight;
2904 
2905             item.start = this.screenToTime(left);
2906             if (options.snapEvents) {
2907                 this.step.snap(item.start);
2908                 left = this.timeToScreen(item.start);
2909             }
2910 
2911             if (left > right) {
2912                 left = right;
2913                 item.start = this.screenToTime(left);
2914             }
2915         }
2916         else if (params.itemDragRight) {
2917             // move the end of the item
2918             left = params.itemLeft;
2919             right = params.itemRight + diffX;
2920 
2921             item.end = this.screenToTime(right);
2922             if (options.snapEvents) {
2923                 this.step.snap(item.end);
2924                 right = this.timeToScreen(item.end);
2925             }
2926 
2927             if (right < left) {
2928                 right = left;
2929                 item.end = this.screenToTime(right);
2930             }
2931         }
2932         else {
2933             // move the item
2934             left = params.itemLeft + diffX;
2935             item.start = this.screenToTime(left);
2936             if (options.snapEvents) {
2937                 this.step.snap(item.start);
2938                 left = this.timeToScreen(item.start);
2939             }
2940 
2941             if (item.end) {
2942                 right = left + (params.itemRight - params.itemLeft);
2943                 item.end = this.screenToTime(right);
2944             }
2945         }
2946 
2947         this.repositionItem(item, left, right);
2948 
2949         if (this.groups.length == 0) {
2950             // TODO: does not work well in FF, forces redraw with every mouse move it seems
2951             this.stackEvents(options.animate);
2952             if (!options.animate) {
2953                 this.redrawFrame();
2954             }
2955             // Note: when animate==true, no redraw is needed here, its done by stackEvents animation
2956         }
2957         else {
2958             // move item from one group to another when needed
2959             if (options.groupsChangeable) {
2960                 var y = mouseY - params.frameTop;
2961                 var group = this.getGroupFromHeight(y);
2962                 if (item.group !== group) {
2963                     // move item to the other group
2964 
2965                     //item.group = group;
2966                     var index = this.items.indexOf(item);
2967                     this.changeItem(index, {'group': this.getGroupName(group)});
2968 
2969                     item.top = group.top;
2970                     this.repositionItem(item);
2971                 }
2972             }
2973         }
2974 
2975         this.redrawDeleteButton();
2976         this.redrawDragAreas();
2977     }
2978     else if (options.moveable) {
2979         var interval = (params.end.valueOf() - params.start.valueOf());
2980         var diffMillisecs = Math.round(parseFloat(-diffX) / size.contentWidth * interval);
2981         var newStart = new Date(params.start.valueOf() + diffMillisecs);
2982         var newEnd = new Date(params.end.valueOf() + diffMillisecs);
2983         this.applyRange(newStart, newEnd);
2984 
2985         // if the applied range is moved due to a fixed min or max, 
2986         // change the diffMillisecs accordingly
2987         var appliedDiff = (this.start.valueOf() - newStart.valueOf());
2988         if (appliedDiff) {
2989             diffMillisecs += appliedDiff;
2990         }
2991 
2992         this.recalcConversion();
2993 
2994         // move the items by changing the left position of their frame.
2995         // this is much faster than repositioning all elements individually via the 
2996         // redrawFrame() function (which is done once at mouseup)
2997         // note that we round diffX to prevent wrong positioning on millisecond scale
2998         var previousLeft = params.previousLeft || 0;
2999         var currentLeft = parseFloat(dom.items.frame.style.left) || 0;
3000         var previousOffset = params.previousOffset || 0;
3001         var frameOffset = previousOffset + (currentLeft - previousLeft);
3002         var frameLeft = -diffMillisecs / interval * size.contentWidth + frameOffset;
3003 
3004         dom.items.frame.style.left = (frameLeft) + "px";
3005 
3006         // read the left again from DOM (IE8- rounds the value)
3007         params.previousOffset = frameOffset;
3008         params.previousLeft = parseFloat(dom.items.frame.style.left) || frameLeft;
3009 
3010         this.redrawCurrentTime();
3011         this.redrawCustomTime();
3012         this.redrawAxis();
3013 
3014         // fire a rangechange event
3015         this.trigger('rangechange');
3016     }
3017 
3018     links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
3019 };
3020

3022 /**
3023  * Stop moving operating.
3024  * This function activated from within the funcion links.Timeline.onMouseDown().
3025  * @param {event}  event   The event
3026  */
3027 links.Timeline.prototype.onMouseUp = function (event) {
3028     var params = this.eventParams,
3029         options = this.options;
3030 
3031     event = event || window.event;
3032 
3033     this.dom.frame.style.cursor = 'auto';
3034 
3035     // remove event listeners here, important for Safari
3036     if (params.onMouseMove) {
3037         links.Timeline.removeEventListener(document, "mousemove", params.onMouseMove);
3038         delete params.onMouseMove;
3039     }
3040     if (params.onMouseUp) {
3041         links.Timeline.removeEventListener(document, "mouseup",   params.onMouseUp);
3042         delete params.onMouseUp;
3043     }
3044     //links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
3045 
3046     if (params.customTime) {
3047         // fire a timechanged event
3048         this.trigger('timechanged');
3049     }
3050     else if (params.editItem) {
3051         var item = this.items[params.itemIndex];
3052 
3053         if (params.moved || params.addItem) {
3054             this.applyChange = true;
3055             this.applyAdd = true;
3056 
3057             this.updateData(params.itemIndex, {
3058                 'start': item.start,
3059                 'end': item.end
3060             });
3061 
3062             // fire an add or change event. 
3063             // Note that the change can be canceled from within an event listener if 
3064             // this listener calls the method cancelChange().
3065             this.trigger(params.addItem ? 'add' : 'change');
3066 
3067             if (params.addItem) {
3068                 if (this.applyAdd) {
3069                     this.updateData(params.itemIndex, {
3070                         'start': item.start,
3071                         'end': item.end,
3072                         'content': item.content,
3073                         'group': this.getGroupName(item.group)
3074                     });
3075                 }
3076                 else {
3077                     // undo an add
3078                     this.deleteItem(params.itemIndex);
3079                 }
3080             }
3081             else {
3082                 if (this.applyChange) {
3083                     this.updateData(params.itemIndex, {
3084                         'start': item.start,
3085                         'end': item.end
3086                     });
3087                 }
3088                 else {
3089                     // undo a change
3090                     delete this.applyChange;
3091                     delete this.applyAdd;
3092 
3093                     var item = this.items[params.itemIndex],
3094                         domItem = item.dom;
3095 
3096                     item.start = params.itemStart;
3097                     item.end = params.itemEnd;
3098                     item.group = params.itemGroup;
3099                     // TODO: original group hould be restored too
3100                     this.repositionItem(item, params.itemLeft, params.itemRight);
3101                 }
3102             }
3103 
3104             this.recalcSize();
3105             this.stackEvents(options.animate);
3106             if (!options.animate) {
3107                 this.redrawFrame();
3108             }
3109             this.redrawDeleteButton();
3110             this.redrawDragAreas();
3111         }
3112     }
3113     else {
3114         if (!params.moved && !params.zoomed) {
3115             // mouse did not move -> user has selected an item
3116 
3117             if (options.editable && (params.target === this.dom.items.deleteButton)) {
3118                 // delete item
3119                 if (this.selection) {
3120                     this.confirmDeleteItem(this.selection.index);
3121                 }
3122                 this.redrawFrame();
3123             }
3124             else if (options.selectable) {
3125                 // select/unselect item
3126                 if (params.itemIndex !== undefined) {
3127                     if (!this.isSelected(params.itemIndex)) {
3128                         this.selectItem(params.itemIndex);
3129                         this.redrawDeleteButton();
3130                         this.redrawDragAreas();
3131                         this.trigger('select');
3132                     }
3133                 }
3134                 else {
3135                     this.unselectItem();
3136                     this.redrawDeleteButton();
3137                     this.redrawDragAreas();
3138                     this.trigger('select');
3139                 }
3140             }
3141         }
3142         else {
3143             // timeline is moved 
3144             this.redrawFrame();
3145 
3146             if ((params.moved && options.moveable) || (params.zoomed && options.zoomable) ) {
3147                 // fire a rangechanged event
3148                 this.trigger('rangechanged');
3149             }
3150         }
3151     }
3152 };

3154 /**
3155  * Double click event occurred for an item
3156  * @param {event}  event
3157  */
3158 links.Timeline.prototype.onDblClick = function (event) {
3159     var params = this.eventParams,
3160         options = this.options,
3161         dom = this.dom,
3162         size = this.size;
3163     event = event || window.event;
3164 
3165     if (!options.editable) {
3166         return;
3167     }
3168 
3169     if (params.itemIndex !== undefined) {
3170         // fire the edit event
3171         this.trigger('edit');
3172     }
3173     else {
3174         // create a new item
3175 
3176         // get mouse position
3177         if (!params.touchDown) {
3178             params.mouseX = event.clientX;
3179             params.mouseY = event.clientY;
3180         }
3181         if (params.mouseX === undefined) {params.mouseX = 0;}
3182         if (params.mouseY === undefined) {params.mouseY = 0;}
3183         var x = params.mouseX - links.Timeline.getAbsoluteLeft(dom.content);
3184         var y = params.mouseY - links.Timeline.getAbsoluteTop(dom.content);
3185 
3186         // create a new event at the current mouse position
3187         var xstart = this.screenToTime(x);
3188         var xend = this.screenToTime(x  + size.frameWidth / 10); // add 10% of timeline width
3189         if (options.snapEvents) {
3190             this.step.snap(xstart);
3191             this.step.snap(xend);
3192         }
3193 
3194         var content = "New";
3195         var group = this.getGroupFromHeight(y);   // (group may be undefined)
3196         this.addItem({
3197             'start': xstart,
3198             'end': xend,
3199             'content': content,
3200             'group': this.getGroupName(group)
3201         });
3202         params.itemIndex = (this.items.length - 1);
3203         this.selectItem(params.itemIndex);
3204 
3205         this.applyAdd = true;
3206 
3207         // fire an add event. 
3208         // Note that the change can be canceled from within an event listener if 
3209         // this listener calls the method cancelAdd().
3210         this.trigger('add');
3211 
3212         if (!this.applyAdd) {
3213             // undo an add
3214             this.deleteItem(params.itemIndex);
3215         }
3216 
3217         this.redrawDeleteButton();
3218         this.redrawDragAreas();
3219     }
3220 
3221     links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
3222 };

3225 /**
3226  * Event handler for mouse wheel event, used to zoom the timeline
3227  * Code from http://adomas.org/javascript-mouse-wheel/
3228  * @param {event}  event   The event
3229  */
3230 links.Timeline.prototype.onMouseWheel = function(event) {
3231     if (!this.options.zoomable)
3232         return;
3233 
3234     if (!event) { /* For IE. */
3235         event = window.event;
3236     }
3237 
3238     // retrieve delta    
3239     var delta = 0;
3240     if (event.wheelDelta) { /* IE/Opera. */
3241         delta = event.wheelDelta/120;
3242     } else if (event.detail) { /* Mozilla case. */
3243         // In Mozilla, sign of delta is different than in IE.
3244         // Also, delta is multiple of 3.
3245         delta = -event.detail/3;
3246     }
3247 
3248     // If delta is nonzero, handle it.
3249     // Basically, delta is now positive if wheel was scrolled up,
3250     // and negative, if wheel was scrolled down.
3251     if (delta) {
3252         // TODO: on FireFox, the window is not redrawn within repeated scroll-events 
3253         // -> use a delayed redraw? Make a zoom queue?
3254 
3255         var timeline = this;
3256         var zoom = function () {
3257             // check if frame is not resized (causing a mismatch with the end date) 
3258             timeline.recalcSize();
3259 
3260             // perform the zoom action. Delta is normally 1 or -1
3261             var zoomFactor = delta / 5.0;
3262             var frameLeft = links.Timeline.getAbsoluteLeft(timeline.dom.content);
3263             var zoomAroundDate =
3264                 (event.clientX != undefined && frameLeft != undefined) ?
3265                     timeline.screenToTime(event.clientX - frameLeft) :
3266                     undefined;
3267 
3268             timeline.zoom(zoomFactor, zoomAroundDate);
3269 
3270             // fire a rangechange and a rangechanged event
3271             timeline.trigger("rangechange");
3272             timeline.trigger("rangechanged");
3273 
3274             /* TODO: smooth scrolling on FF
3275              timeline.zooming = false;
3276 
3277              if (timeline.zoomingQueue) {
3278              setTimeout(timeline.zoomingQueue, 100);
3279              timeline.zoomingQueue = undefined;
3280              }
3281 
3282              timeline.zoomCount = (timeline.zoomCount || 0) + 1;
3283              console.log('zoomCount', timeline.zoomCount)
3284              */
3285         };
3286 
3287         zoom();
3288 
3289         /* TODO: smooth scrolling on FF
3290          if (!timeline.zooming || true) {
3291 
3292          timeline.zooming = true;
3293          setTimeout(zoom, 100);
3294          }
3295          else {
3296          timeline.zoomingQueue = zoom;
3297          }
3298          //*/
3299     }
3300 
3301     // Prevent default actions caused by mouse wheel.
3302     // That might be ugly, but we handle scrolls somehow
3303     // anyway, so don't bother here...
3304     links.Timeline.preventDefault(event);
3305 };

3308 /**
3309  * Zoom the timeline the given zoomfactor in or out. Start and end date will
3310  * be adjusted, and the timeline will be redrawn. You can optionally give a
3311  * date around which to zoom.
3312  * For example, try zoomfactor = 0.1 or -0.1
3313  * @param {Number} zoomFactor      Zooming amount. Positive value will zoom in,
3314  *                                 negative value will zoom out
3315  * @param {Date}   zoomAroundDate  Date around which will be zoomed. Optional
3316  */
3317 links.Timeline.prototype.zoom = function(zoomFactor, zoomAroundDate) {
3318     // if zoomAroundDate is not provided, take it half between start Date and end Date
3319     if (zoomAroundDate == undefined) {
3320         zoomAroundDate = new Date((this.start.valueOf() + this.end.valueOf()) / 2);
3321     }
3322 
3323     // prevent zoom factor larger than 1 or smaller than -1 (larger than 1 will
3324     // result in a start>=end )
3325     if (zoomFactor >= 1) {
3326         zoomFactor = 0.9;
3327     }
3328     if (zoomFactor <= -1) {
3329         zoomFactor = -0.9;
3330     }
3331 
3332     // adjust a negative factor such that zooming in with 0.1 equals zooming
3333     // out with a factor -0.1
3334     if (zoomFactor < 0) {
3335         zoomFactor = zoomFactor / (1 + zoomFactor);
3336     }
3337 
3338     // zoom start Date and end Date relative to the zoomAroundDate
3339     var startDiff = parseFloat(this.start.valueOf() - zoomAroundDate.valueOf());
3340     var endDiff = parseFloat(this.end.valueOf() - zoomAroundDate.valueOf());
3341 
3342     // calculate new dates
3343     var newStart = new Date(this.start.valueOf() - startDiff * zoomFactor);
3344     var newEnd   = new Date(this.end.valueOf() - endDiff * zoomFactor);
3345 
3346     this.applyRange(newStart, newEnd, zoomAroundDate);
3347 
3348     this.recalcSize();
3349     var animate = this.options.animate ? this.options.animateZoom : false;
3350     this.stackEvents(animate);
3351     if (!animate || this.groups.length > 0) {
3352         this.redrawFrame();
3353     }
3354     /* TODO
3355      else {
3356      this.redrawFrame();
3357      this.recalcSize();
3358      this.stackEvents(animate);
3359      this.redrawFrame();
3360      }*/
3361 };
3362 
3363 
3364 /**
3365  * Move the timeline the given movefactor to the left or right. Start and end
3366  * date will be adjusted, and the timeline will be redrawn.
3367  * For example, try moveFactor = 0.1 or -0.1
3368  * @param {Number}  moveFactor      Moving amount. Positive value will move right,
3369  *                                 negative value will move left
3370  */
3371 links.Timeline.prototype.move = function(moveFactor) {
3372     // zoom start Date and end Date relative to the zoomAroundDate
3373     var diff = parseFloat(this.end.valueOf() - this.start.valueOf());
3374 
3375     // apply new dates
3376     var newStart = new Date(this.start.valueOf() + diff * moveFactor);
3377     var newEnd   = new Date(this.end.valueOf() + diff * moveFactor);
3378     this.applyRange(newStart, newEnd);
3379 
3380     this.recalcConversion();
3381     this.redrawFrame();
3382 };

3384 /**
3385  * Reposition given item
3386  * @param {Object} item
3387  * @param {Number} left
3388  * @param {Number} right
3389  */
3390 links.Timeline.prototype.repositionItem = function (item, left, right) {
3391     var domItem = item.dom;
3392     switch(item.type) {
3393         case 'range':
3394             domItem.style.left = left + "px";
3395             //domItem.style.width = Math.max(right - left - 2 * item.borderWidth, 1) + "px";  // TODO: borderwidth
3396             domItem.style.width = Math.max(right - left, 1) + "px";
3397             break;
3398 
3399         case 'box':
3400             domItem.style.left = (left - item.width / 2) + "px";
3401             domItem.line.style.left = (left - item.lineWidth / 2) + "px";
3402             domItem.dot.style.left = (left - item.dotWidth / 2) + "px";
3403             break;
3404 
3405         case 'dot':
3406             domItem.style.left = (left - item.dotWidth / 2) + "px";
3407             break;
3408     }
3409 
3410     if (item.group) {
3411         item.top = item.group.top;
3412         domItem.style.top = item.top + 'px';
3413     }
3414 };
3415 
3416 /**
3417  * Apply a visible range. The range is limited to feasible maximum and minimum
3418  * range.
3419  * @param {Date} start
3420  * @param {Date} end
3421  * @param {Date}   zoomAroundDate  Optional. Date around which will be zoomed.
3422  */
3423 links.Timeline.prototype.applyRange = function (start, end, zoomAroundDate) {
3424     // calculate new start and end value
3425     var startValue = start.valueOf();
3426     var endValue = end.valueOf();
3427     var interval = (endValue - startValue);
3428 
3429     // determine maximum and minimum interval
3430     var options = this.options;
3431     var year = 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 365;
3432     var intervalMin = Number(options.intervalMin) || 10;
3433     if (intervalMin < 10) {
3434         intervalMin = 10;
3435     }
3436     var intervalMax = Number(options.intervalMax) || 10000 * year;
3437     if (intervalMax > 10000 * year) {
3438         intervalMax = 10000 * year;
3439     }
3440     if (intervalMax < intervalMin) {
3441         intervalMax = intervalMin;
3442     }
3443 
3444     // determine min and max date value
3445     var min = options.min ? options.min.valueOf() : undefined;
3446     var max = options.max ? options.max.valueOf() : undefined;
3447     if (min != undefined && max != undefined) {
3448         if (min >= max) {
3449             // empty range
3450             var day = 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24;
3451             max = min + day;
3452         }
3453         if (intervalMax > (max - min)) {
3454             intervalMax = (max - min);
3455         }
3456         if (intervalMin > (max - min)) {
3457             intervalMin = (max - min);
3458         }
3459     }
3460 
3461     // prevent empty interval
3462     if (startValue >= endValue) {
3463         endValue += 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24;
3464     }
3465 
3466     // prevent too small scale
3467     // TODO: IE has problems with milliseconds
3468     if (interval < intervalMin) {
3469         var diff = (intervalMin - interval);
3470         var f = zoomAroundDate ? (zoomAroundDate.valueOf() - startValue) / interval : 0.5;
3471         startValue -= Math.round(diff * f);
3472         endValue   += Math.round(diff * (1 - f));
3473     }
3474 
3475     // prevent too large scale
3476     if (interval > intervalMax) {
3477         var diff = (interval - intervalMax);
3478         var f = zoomAroundDate ? (zoomAroundDate.valueOf() - startValue) / interval : 0.5;
3479         startValue += Math.round(diff * f);
3480         endValue   -= Math.round(diff * (1 - f));
3481     }
3482 
3483     // prevent to small start date
3484     if (min != undefined) {
3485         var diff = (startValue - min);
3486         if (diff < 0) {
3487             startValue -= diff;
3488             endValue -= diff;
3489         }
3490     }
3491 
3492     // prevent to large end date
3493     if (max != undefined) {
3494         var diff = (max - endValue);
3495         if (diff < 0) {
3496             startValue += diff;
3497             endValue += diff;
3498         }
3499     }
3500 
3501     // apply new dates
3502     this.start = new Date(startValue);
3503     this.end = new Date(endValue);
3504 };
3505 
3506 /**
3507  * Delete an item after a confirmation.
3508  * The deletion can be cancelled by executing .cancelDelete() during the
3509  * triggered event 'delete'.
3510  * @param {int} index   Index of the item to be deleted
3511  */
3512 links.Timeline.prototype.confirmDeleteItem = function(index) {
3513     this.applyDelete = true;
3514 
3515     // select the event to be deleted
3516     if (!this.isSelected(index)) {
3517         this.selectItem(index);
3518     }
3519 
3520     // fire a delete event trigger. 
3521     // Note that the delete event can be canceled from within an event listener if 
3522     // this listener calls the method cancelChange().
3523     this.trigger('delete');
3524 
3525     if (this.applyDelete) {
3526         this.deleteItem(index);
3527     }
3528 
3529     delete this.applyDelete;
3530 };
3531 
3532 /**
3533  * Delete an item
3534  * @param {int} index   Index of the item to be deleted
3535  */
3536 links.Timeline.prototype.deleteItem = function(index) {
3537     if (index >= this.items.length) {
3538         throw "Cannot delete row, index out of range";
3539     }
3540 
3541     this.unselectItem();
3542 
3543     // actually delete the item
3544     this.items.splice(index, 1);
3545 
3546     // delete the row in the original data table
3547     if (this.data) {
3548         if (google && google.visualization &&
3549             this.data instanceof google.visualization.DataTable) {
3550             this.data.removeRow(index);
3551         }
3552         else if (links.Timeline.isArray(this.data)) {
3553             this.data.splice(index, 1);
3554         }
3555         else {
3556             throw "Cannot delete row from data, unknown data type";
3557         }
3558     }
3559 
3560     this.size.dataChanged = true;
3561     this.redrawFrame();
3562     this.recalcSize();
3563     this.stackEvents(this.options.animate);
3564     if (!this.options.animate) {
3565         this.redrawFrame();
3566     }
3567     this.size.dataChanged = false;
3568 };

3571 /**
3572  * Delete all items
3573  */
3574 links.Timeline.prototype.deleteAllItems = function() {
3575     this.unselectItem();
3576 
3577     // delete the loaded data
3578     this.items = [];
3579 
3580     // delete the groups
3581     this.deleteGroups();
3582 
3583     // empty original data table
3584     if (this.data) {
3585         if (google && google.visualization &&
3586             this.data instanceof google.visualization.DataTable) {
3587             this.data.removeRows(0, this.data.getNumberOfRows());
3588         }
3589         else if (links.Timeline.isArray(this.data)) {
3590             this.data.splice(0, this.data.length);
3591         }
3592         else {
3593             throw "Cannot delete row from data, unknown data type";
3594         }
3595     }
3596 
3597     this.size.dataChanged = true;
3598     this.redrawFrame();
3599     this.recalcSize();
3600     this.stackEvents(this.options.animate);
3601     if (!this.options.animate) {
3602         this.redrawFrame();
3603     }
3604     this.size.dataChanged = false;
3605 };

3608 /**
3609  * Find the group from a given height in the timeline
3610  * @param {Number} height   Height in the timeline
3611  * @param {boolean}
3612     * @return {Object} group   The group object, or undefined if out of range
3613  */
3614 links.Timeline.prototype.getGroupFromHeight = function(height) {
3615     var groups = this.groups,
3616         options = this.options,
3617         size = this.size,
3618         y = height - (options.axisOnTop ? size.axis.height : 0);
3619 
3620     if (groups) {
3621         var group;
3622         /* TODO: cleanup
3623          for (var i = 0, iMax = groups.length; i < iMax; i++) {
3624          group = groups[i];
3625          if (y > group.top && y < group.top + group.height) {
3626          return group;
3627          }
3628          }*/
3629         for (var i = groups.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
3630             group = groups[i];
3631             if (y > group.top) {
3632                 return group;
3633             }
3634         }
3635 
3636         return group; // return the last group
3637     }
3638 
3639     return undefined;
3640 };

3644  * @param {Number} index

3647  *                              {Date} end (optional),
3648  *                              {String} content (required),
3649  *                              {String} group (optional)
3650  */
3651 links.Timeline.prototype.getItem = function (index) {
3652     if (index >= this.items.length) {
3653         throw "Cannot get item, index out of range";
3654     }
3655

3664     if (item.group) {

3671 /**
3672  * Add a new item.
3673  * @param {Object} itemData     Object containing item properties:<br>
3674  *                              {Date} start (required),
3675  *                              {Date} end (optional),
3676  *                              {String} content (required),
3677  *                              {String} group (optional)
3678  */
3679 links.Timeline.prototype.addItem = function (itemData) {
3680     var items = [
3681         itemData
3682     ];
3683

3687 /**
3688  * Add new items.
3689  * @param {Array} items  An array containing Objects.
3690  *                       The objects must have the following parameters:
3691  *                         {Date} start,
3692  *                         {Date} end,
3693  *                         {String} content with text or HTML code,
3694  *                         {String} group
3695  */
3696 links.Timeline.prototype.addItems = function (items) {
3697     var newItems = items,
3698         curItems = this.items;
3699 
3700     // append the items
3701     for (var i = 0, iMax = newItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
3702         var itemData = items[i];
3703 
3704         curItems.push(this.createItem(itemData));
3705 
3706         var index = curItems.length - 1;
3707         this.updateData(index, itemData);
3708     }
3709 
3710     // redraw timeline
3711     this.size.dataChanged = true;
3712     this.redrawFrame();
3713     this.recalcSize();
3714     this.stackEvents(false);
3715     this.redrawFrame();
3716     this.size.dataChanged = false;
3717 };

3719 /**
3720  * Create an item object, containing all needed parameters
3721  * @param {Object} itemData  Object containing parameters start, end
3722  *                           content, group.
3723  * @return {Object} item
3724  */
3725 links.Timeline.prototype.createItem = function(itemData) {
3726     var item = {
3727         'start': itemData.start,
3728         'end': itemData.end,
3729         'content': itemData.content,
3730         'type': itemData.end ? 'range' : this.options.style,
3731         'group': this.getGroup(itemData.group),
3732         'className': itemData.className,
3733         'top': 0,
3734         'left': 0,
3735         'width': 0,
3736         'height': 0,
3737         'lineWidth' : 0,
3738         'dotWidth': 0,
3739         'dotHeight': 0
3740     };
3741     return item;
3742 };

3744 /**
3745  * Edit an item
3746  * @param {Number} index
3747  * @param {Object} itemData     Object containing item properties:<br>
3748  *                              {Date} start (required),
3749  *                              {Date} end (optional),
3750  *                              {String} content (required),
3751  *                              {String} group (optional)
3752  */
3753 links.Timeline.prototype.changeItem = function (index, itemData) {
3754     var item = this.items[index];
3755     if (!item) {
3756         throw "Cannot change item, index out of range";
3757     }
3758 
3759     // create new item
3760     var newItem = {
3761         'start': itemData.hasOwnProperty('start') ? itemData.start : item.start,
3762         'end': itemData.hasOwnProperty('end') ? itemData.end : item.end,
3763         'content': itemData.hasOwnProperty('content') ? itemData.content : item.content,
3764         'group': itemData.hasOwnProperty('group') ? itemData.group : this.getGroupName(item.group)
3765     };
3766     this.items[index] = this.createItem(newItem);
3767 
3768         // update the original data table
3769     this.updateData(index, itemData);
3770 
3771     // redraw timeline
3772     this.size.dataChanged = true;
3773     this.redrawFrame();
3774     this.recalcSize();
3775     this.stackEvents(false);
3776     this.redrawFrame();
3777     this.size.dataChanged = false;
3778 };

3780 /**
3781  * Delete all groups
3782  */
3783 links.Timeline.prototype.deleteGroups = function () {
3784     this.groups = [];
3785     this.groupIndexes = {};
3786 };

3789 /**
3790  * Get a group by the group name. When the group does not exist,
3791  * it will be created.
3792  * @param {String} groupName   the name of the group
3793  * @return {Object} groupObject
3794  */
3795 links.Timeline.prototype.getGroup = function (groupName) {
3796     var groups = this.groups,
3797         groupIndexes = this.groupIndexes,
3798         groupObj = undefined;
3799 
3800     var groupIndex = groupIndexes[groupName];
3801     if (groupIndex === undefined && groupName !== undefined) {
3802         groupObj = {
3803             'content': groupName,
3804             'labelTop': 0,
3805             'lineTop': 0
3806             // note: this object will lateron get addition information, 
3807             //       such as height and width of the group         
3808         };
3809         groups.push(groupObj);
3810         // sort the groups
3811         groups = groups.sort(function (a, b) {
3812             if (a.content > b.content) {
3813                 return 1;
3814             }
3815             if (a.content < b.content) {
3816                 return -1;
3817             }
3818             return 0;
3819         });
3820 
3821         // rebuilt the groupIndexes
3822         for (var i = 0, iMax = groups.length; i < iMax; i++) {
3823             groupIndexes[groups[i].content] = i;
3824         }
3825     }
3826     else {
3827         groupObj = groups[groupIndex];
3828     }
3829 
3830     return groupObj;
3831 };
3832 
3833 /**
3834  * Get the group name from a group object.
3835  * @param {Object} groupObject
3836  * @return {String} groupName   the name of the group, or undefined when group
3837  *                              was not provided
3838  */
3839 links.Timeline.prototype.getGroupName = function (groupObj) {
3840     return groupObj ? groupObj.content : undefined;
3841 }

3872 /**
3873  * Select an event. The visible chart range will be moved such that the selected
3874  * event is placed in the middle.
3875  * For example selection = [{row: 5}];
3876  * @param {Array} selection   An array with a column row, containing the row
3877  *                           number (the id) of the event to be selected.
3878  * @return {boolean}         true if selection is succesfully set, else false.
3879  */
3880 links.Timeline.prototype.setSelection = function(selection) {
3881     if (selection != undefined && selection.length > 0) {
3882         if (selection[0].row != undefined) {
3883             var index = selection[0].row;
3884             if (this.items[index]) {
3885                 var item = this.items[index];
3886                 this.selectItem(index);
3887 
3888                 // move the visible chart range to the selected event.
3889                 var start = item.start;
3890                 var end = item.end;
3891                 var middle;
3892                 if (end != undefined) {
3893                     middle = new Date((end.valueOf() + start.valueOf()) / 2);
3894                 } else {
3895                     middle = new Date(start);
3896                 }
3897                 var diff = (this.end.valueOf() - this.start.valueOf()),
3898                     newStart = new Date(middle.valueOf() - diff/2),
3899                     newEnd = new Date(middle.valueOf() + diff/2);
3900 
3901                 this.setVisibleChartRange(newStart, newEnd);
3902 
3903                 return true;
3904             }
3905         }
3906     }
3907     else {
3908         // unselect current selection
3909         this.unselectItem();
3910     }
3911     return false;
3912 };
3913 
3914 /**
3915  * Retrieve the currently selected event
3916  * @return {Array} sel  An array with a column row, containing the row number
3917  *                      of the selected event. If there is no selection, an
3918  *                      empty array is returned.
3919  */
3920 links.Timeline.prototype.getSelection = function() {
3921     var sel = [];
3922     if (this.selection) {
3923         sel.push({"row": this.selection.index});
3924     }
3925     return sel;
3926 };

3929 /**
3930  * Select an item by its index
3931  * @param {Number} index
3932  */
3933 links.Timeline.prototype.selectItem = function(index) {
3934     this.unselectItem();
3935 
3936     this.selection = undefined;
3937 
3938     if (this.items[index] !== undefined) {
3939         var item = this.items[index],
3940             domItem = item.dom;
3941 
3942         this.selection = {
3943             'index': index,
3944             'item': domItem
3945         };
3946 
3947         if (this.options.editable) {
3948             domItem.style.cursor = 'move';
3949         }
3950         switch (item.type) {
3951             case 'range':
3952                 links.Timeline.addClassName(domItem, 'timeline-event-selected');
3953                 break;
3954             case 'box':
3955                 links.Timeline.addClassName(domItem, 'timeline-event-selected');
3956                 links.Timeline.addClassName(domItem.line, 'timeline-event-selected');
3957                 links.Timeline.addClassName(domItem.dot, 'timeline-event-selected');
3958                 break;
3959             case 'dot':
3960                 links.Timeline.addClassName(domItem, 'timeline-event-selected');
3961                 links.Timeline.addClassName(domItem.dot, 'timeline-event-selected');
3962                 break;
3963         }
3964 
3965         /* TODO: cleanup this cannot work as this breaks any javscript action inside the item
3966          // move the item to the end, such that it will be displayed on top of the other items
3967          var parent = domItem.parentNode;
3968          if (parent) {
3969          parent.removeChild(domItem);
3970          parent.appendChild(domItem);
3971          }
3972          */
3973     }
3974 };

3981 links.Timeline.prototype.isSelected = function (index) {

3987  */
3988 links.Timeline.prototype.unselectItem = function() {
3989     if (this.selection) {
3990         var item = this.items[this.selection.index];
3991 
3992         if (item && item.dom) {
3993             var domItem = item.dom;
3994             domItem.style.cursor = '';
3995             switch (item.type) {
3996                 case 'range':
3997                     links.Timeline.removeClassName(domItem, 'timeline-event-selected');
3998                     break;
3999                 case 'box':
4000                     links.Timeline.removeClassName(domItem, 'timeline-event-selected');
4001                     links.Timeline.removeClassName(domItem.line, 'timeline-event-selected');
4002                     links.Timeline.removeClassName(domItem.dot, 'timeline-event-selected');
4003                     break;
4004                 case 'dot':
4005                     links.Timeline.removeClassName(domItem, 'timeline-event-selected');
4006                     links.Timeline.removeClassName(domItem.dot, 'timeline-event-selected');
4007                     break;
4008             }
4009         }
4010     }
4011 
4012     this.selection = undefined;
4013 };

4016 /**
4017  * Stack the items such that they don't overlap. The items will have a minimal
4018  * distance equal to options.eventMargin.
4019  * @param {boolean} animate     if animate is true, the items are moved to
4020  *                              their new position animated
4021  */
4022 links.Timeline.prototype.stackEvents = function(animate) {
4023     if (this.groups.length > 0) {
4024         // under this conditions we refuse to stack the events
4025         return;
4026     }
4027 
4028     if (animate == undefined) {
4029         animate = false;
4030     }
4031 
4032     var sortedItems = this.stackOrder(this.items);
4033     var finalItems = this.stackCalculateFinal(sortedItems, animate);
4034 
4035     if (animate) {
4036         // move animated to the final positions
4037         var animation = this.animation;
4038         if (!animation) {
4039             animation = {};
4040             this.animation = animation;
4041         }
4042         animation.finalItems = finalItems;
4043 
4044         var timeline = this;
4045         var step = function () {
4046             var arrived = timeline.stackMoveOneStep(sortedItems, animation.finalItems);
4047 
4048             timeline.recalcSize();
4049             timeline.redrawFrame();
4050 
4051             if (!arrived) {
4052                 animation.timer = setTimeout(step, 30);
4053             }
4054             else {
4055                 delete animation.finalItems;
4056                 delete animation.timer;
4057             }
4058         };
4059 
4060         if (!animation.timer) {
4061             animation.timer = setTimeout(step, 30);
4062         }
4063     }
4064     else {
4065         this.stackMoveToFinal(sortedItems, finalItems);
4066         this.recalcSize();
4067     }
4068 };
4069 
4070 
4071 /**
4072  * Order the items in the array this.items. The order is determined via:
4073  * - Ranges go before boxes and dots.
4074  * - The item with the left most location goes first
4075  * @param {Array} items        Array with items
4076  * @return {Array} sortedItems Array with sorted items
4077  */
4078 links.Timeline.prototype.stackOrder = function(items) {
4079     // TODO: store the sorted items, to have less work later on
4080     var sortedItems = items.concat([]);
4081 
4082     var f = function (a, b) {
4083         if (a.type == 'range' && b.type != 'range') {
4084             return -1;
4085         }
4086 
4087         if (a.type != 'range' && b.type == 'range') {
4088             return 1;
4089         }
4090 
4091         return (a.left - b.left);
4092     };
4093 
4094     sortedItems.sort(f);
4095 
4096     return sortedItems;
4097 };
4098 
4099 /**
4100  * Adjust vertical positions of the events such that they don't overlap each
4101  * other.
4102  */
4103 links.Timeline.prototype.stackCalculateFinal = function(items) {
4104     var size = this.size,
4105         axisTop = size.axis.top,
4106         options = this.options,
4107         axisOnTop = options.axisOnTop,
4108         eventMargin = options.eventMargin,
4109         eventMarginAxis = options.eventMarginAxis,
4110         finalItems = [];
4111 
4112     // initialize final positions
4113     for (var i = 0, iMax = items.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4114         var item = items[i],
4115             top,
4116             left,
4117             right,
4118             bottom,
4119             height = item.height,
4120             width = item.width;
4121 
4122         if (axisOnTop) {
4123             top = axisTop + eventMarginAxis + eventMargin / 2;
4124         }
4125         else {
4126             top = axisTop - height - eventMarginAxis - eventMargin / 2;
4127         }
4128         bottom = top + height;
4129 
4130         switch (item.type) {
4131             case 'range':
4132             case 'dot':
4133                 left = this.timeToScreen(item.start);
4134                 right = item.end ? this.timeToScreen(item.end) : left + width;
4135                 break;
4136 
4137             case 'box':
4138                 left = this.timeToScreen(item.start) - width / 2;
4139                 right = left + width;
4140                 break;
4141         }
4142 
4143         finalItems[i] = {
4144             'left': left,
4145             'top': top,
4146             'right': right,
4147             'bottom': bottom,
4148             'height': height,
4149             'item': item
4150         };
4151     }
4152 
4153     if (this.options.stackEvents) {
4154         // calculate new, non-overlapping positions
4155         //var items = sortedItems;
4156         for (var i = 0, iMax = finalItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4157             //for (var i = finalItems.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
4158             var finalItem = finalItems[i];
4159             var collidingItem = null;
4160             do {
4161                 // TODO: optimize checking for overlap. when there is a gap without items,
4162                 //  you only need to check for items from the next item on, not from zero
4163                 collidingItem = this.stackEventsCheckOverlap(finalItems, i, 0, i-1);
4164                 if (collidingItem != null) {
4165                     // There is a collision. Reposition the event above the colliding element
4166                     if (axisOnTop) {
4167                         finalItem.top = collidingItem.top + collidingItem.height + eventMargin;
4168                     }
4169                     else {
4170                         finalItem.top = collidingItem.top - finalItem.height - eventMargin;
4171                     }
4172                     finalItem.bottom = finalItem.top + finalItem.height;
4173                 }
4174             } while (collidingItem);
4175         }
4176     }
4177 
4178     return finalItems;
4179 };
4180 
4181 
4182 /**
4183  * Move the events one step in the direction of their final positions
4184  * @param {Array} currentItems   Array with the real items and their current
4185  *                               positions
4186  * @param {Array} finalItems     Array with objects containing the final
4187  *                               positions of the items
4188  * @return {boolean} arrived     True if all items have reached their final
4189  *                               location, else false
4190  */
4191 links.Timeline.prototype.stackMoveOneStep = function(currentItems, finalItems) {
4192     var arrived = true;
4193 
4194     // apply new positions animated
4195     for (i = 0, iMax = currentItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4196         var finalItem = finalItems[i],
4197             item = finalItem.item;
4198 
4199         var topNow = parseInt(item.top);
4200         var topFinal = parseInt(finalItem.top);
4201         var diff = (topFinal - topNow);
4202         if (diff) {
4203             var step = (topFinal == topNow) ? 0 : ((topFinal > topNow) ? 1 : -1);
4204             if (Math.abs(diff) > 4) step = diff / 4;
4205             var topNew = parseInt(topNow + step);
4206 
4207             if (topNew != topFinal) {
4208                 arrived = false;
4209             }
4210 
4211             item.top = topNew;
4212             item.bottom = item.top + item.height;
4213         }
4214         else {
4215             item.top = finalItem.top;
4216             item.bottom = finalItem.bottom;
4217         }
4218 
4219         item.left = finalItem.left;
4220         item.right = finalItem.right;
4221     }
4222 
4223     return arrived;
4224 };
4225 
4226 
4227 
4228 /**
4229  * Move the events from their current position to the final position
4230  * @param {Array} currentItems   Array with the real items and their current
4231  *                               positions
4232  * @param {Array} finalItems     Array with objects containing the final
4233  *                               positions of the items
4234  */
4235 links.Timeline.prototype.stackMoveToFinal = function(currentItems, finalItems) {
4236     // Put the events directly at there final position
4237     for (i = 0, iMax = currentItems.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4238         var current = currentItems[i],
4239             finalItem = finalItems[i];
4240 
4241         current.left = finalItem.left;
4242         current.top = finalItem.top;
4243         current.right = finalItem.right;
4244         current.bottom = finalItem.bottom;
4245     }
4246 };
4247 
4248 
4249 
4250 /**
4251  * Check if the destiny position of given item overlaps with any
4252  * of the other items from index itemStart to itemEnd.
4253  * @param {Array} items      Array with items
4254  * @param {int}  itemIndex   Number of the item to be checked for overlap
4255  * @param {int}  itemStart   First item to be checked.
4256  * @param {int}  itemEnd     Last item to be checked.
4257  * @return {Object}          colliding item, or undefined when no collisions
4258  */
4259 links.Timeline.prototype.stackEventsCheckOverlap = function(items, itemIndex,
4260                                                             itemStart, itemEnd) {
4261     var eventMargin = this.options.eventMargin,
4262         collision = this.collision;
4263 
4264     // we loop from end to start, as we suppose that the chance of a 
4265     // collision is larger for items at the end, so check these first.
4266     var item1 = items[itemIndex];
4267     for (var i = itemEnd; i >= itemStart; i--) {
4268         var item2 = items[i];
4269         if (collision(item1, item2, eventMargin)) {
4270             if (i != itemIndex) {
4271                 return item2;
4272             }
4273         }
4274     }
4275 
4276     return undefined;
4277 };
4278 
4279 /**
4280  * Test if the two provided items collide
4281  * The items must have parameters left, right, top, and bottom.
4282  * @param {Element} item1       The first item
4283  * @param {Element} item2       The second item
4284  * @param {Number}              margin  A minimum required margin. Optional.
4285  *                              If margin is provided, the two items will be
4286  *                              marked colliding when they overlap or
4287  *                              when the margin between the two is smaller than
4288  *                              the requested margin.
4289  * @return {boolean}            true if item1 and item2 collide, else false
4290  */
4291 links.Timeline.prototype.collision = function(item1, item2, margin) {
4292     // set margin if not specified 
4293     if (margin == undefined) {
4294         margin = 0;
4295     }
4296 
4297     // calculate if there is overlap (collision)
4298     return (item1.left - margin < item2.right &&
4299         item1.right + margin > item2.left &&
4300         item1.top - margin < item2.bottom &&
4301         item1.bottom + margin > item2.top);
4302 };
4303 
4304 
4305 /**
4306  * fire an event
4307  * @param {String} event   The name of an event, for example "rangechange" or "edit"
4308  */
4309 links.Timeline.prototype.trigger = function (event) {
4310     // built up properties
4311     var properties = null;
4312     switch (event) {
4313         case 'rangechange':
4314         case 'rangechanged':
4315             properties = {
4316                 'start': new Date(this.start),
4317                 'end': new Date(this.end)
4318             };
4319             break;
4320 
4321         case 'timechange':
4322         case 'timechanged':
4323             properties = {
4324                 'time': new Date(this.customTime)
4325             };
4326             break;
4327     }
4328 
4329     // trigger the links event bus
4330     links.events.trigger(this, event, properties);
4331 
4332     // trigger the google event bus
4333     if (google && google.visualization) {
4334         google.visualization.events.trigger(this, event, properties);
4335     }
4336 };
