4340 /** ------------------------------------------------------------------------ **/
4341 
4342 
4343 /**
4344  * Event listener (singleton)
4345  */
4346 links.events = links.events || {
4347     'listeners': [],
4348 
4349     /**
4350      * Find a single listener by its object
4351      * @param {Object} object
4352      * @return {Number} index  -1 when not found
4353      */
4354     'indexOf': function (object) {
4355         var listeners = this.listeners;
4356         for (var i = 0, iMax = this.listeners.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4357             var listener = listeners[i];
4358             if (listener && listener.object == object) {
4359                 return i;
4360             }
4361         }
4362         return -1;
4363     },
4364 
4365     /**
4366      * Add an event listener
4367      * @param {Object} object
4368      * @param {String} event       The name of an event, for example 'select'
4369      * @param {function} callback  The callback method, called when the
4370      *                             event takes place
4371      */
4372     'addListener': function (object, event, callback) {
4373         var index = this.indexOf(object);
4374         var listener = this.listeners[index];
4375         if (!listener) {
4376             listener = {
4377                 'object': object,
4378                 'events': {}
4379             };
4380             this.listeners.push(listener);
4381         }
4382 
4383         var callbacks = listener.events[event];
4384         if (!callbacks) {
4385             callbacks = [];
4386             listener.events[event] = callbacks;
4387         }
4388 
4389         // add the callback if it does not yet exist
4390         if (callbacks.indexOf(callback) == -1) {
4391             callbacks.push(callback);
4392         }
4393     },
4394 
4395     /**
4396      * Remove an event listener
4397      * @param {Object} object
4398      * @param {String} event       The name of an event, for example 'select'
4399      * @param {function} callback  The registered callback method
4400      */
4401     'removeListener': function (object, event, callback) {
4402         var index = this.indexOf(object);
4403         var listener = this.listeners[index];
4404         if (listener) {
4405             var callbacks = listener.events[event];
4406             if (callbacks) {
4407                 var index = callbacks.indexOf(callback);
4408                 if (index != -1) {
4409                     callbacks.splice(index, 1);
4410                 }
4411 
4412                 // remove the array when empty
4413                 if (callbacks.length == 0) {
4414                     delete listener.events[event];
4415                 }
4416             }
4417 
4418             // count the number of registered events. remove listener when empty
4419             var count = 0;
4420             var events = listener.events;
4421             for (var e in events) {
4422                 if (events.hasOwnProperty(e)) {
4423                     count++;
4424                 }
4425             }
4426             if (count == 0) {
4427                 delete this.listeners[index];
4428             }
4429         }
4430     },
4431 
4432     /**
4433      * Remove all registered event listeners
4434      */
4435     'removeAllListeners': function () {
4436         this.listeners = [];
4437     },
4438 
4439     /**
4440      * Trigger an event. All registered event handlers will be called
4441      * @param {Object} object
4442      * @param {String} event
4443      * @param {Object} properties (optional)
4444      */
4445     'trigger': function (object, event, properties) {
4446         var index = this.indexOf(object);
4447         var listener = this.listeners[index];
4448         if (listener) {
4449             var callbacks = listener.events[event];
4450             if (callbacks) {
4451                 for (var i = 0, iMax = callbacks.length; i < iMax; i++) {
4452                     callbacks[i](properties);
4453                 }
4454             }
4455         }
4456     }
4457 };
4458 
4459 
4460 /** ------------------------------------------------------------------------ **/
4461 
4462 /**
4463  * @constructor  links.Timeline.StepDate
4464  * The class StepDate is an iterator for dates. You provide a start date and an
4465  * end date. The class itself determines the best scale (step size) based on the
4466  * provided start Date, end Date, and minimumStep.
4467  *
4468  * If minimumStep is provided, the step size is chosen as close as possible
4469  * to the minimumStep but larger than minimumStep. If minimumStep is not
4470  * provided, the scale is set to 1 DAY.
4471  * The minimumStep should correspond with the onscreen size of about 6 characters
4472  *
4473  * Alternatively, you can set a scale by hand.
4474  * After creation, you can initialize the class by executing start(). Then you
4475  * can iterate from the start date to the end date via next(). You can check if
4476  * the end date is reached with the function end(). After each step, you can
4477  * retrieve the current date via get().
4478  * The class step has scales ranging from milliseconds, seconds, minutes, hours,
4479  * days, to years.
4480  *
4481  * Version: 1.0
4482  *
4483  * @param {Date} start        The start date, for example new Date(2010, 9, 21)
4484  *                            or new Date(2010, 9,21,23,45,00)
4485  * @param {Date} end          The end date
4486  * @param {int}  minimumStep  Optional. Minimum step size in milliseconds
4487  */
4488 links.Timeline.StepDate = function(start, end, minimumStep) {
4489 
4490     // variables
4491     this.current = new Date();
4492     this._start = new Date();
4493     this._end = new Date();
4494 
4495     this.autoScale  = true;
4496     this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY;
4497     this.step = 1;
4498 
4499     // initialize the range
4500     this.setRange(start, end, minimumStep);
4501 };
4502 
4503 /// enum scale
4504 links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE = { MILLISECOND : 1,
4505     SECOND : 2,
4506     MINUTE : 3,
4507     HOUR : 4,
4508     DAY : 5,
4509     MONTH : 6,
4510     YEAR : 7};
4511 
4512 
4513 /**
4514  * Set a new range
4515  * If minimumStep is provided, the step size is chosen as close as possible
4516  * to the minimumStep but larger than minimumStep. If minimumStep is not
4517  * provided, the scale is set to 1 DAY.
4518  * The minimumStep should correspond with the onscreen size of about 6 characters
4519  * @param {Date} start        The start date and time.
4520  * @param {Date} end          The end date and time.
4521  * @param {int}  minimumStep  Optional. Minimum step size in milliseconds
4522  */
4523 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.setRange = function(start, end, minimumStep) {
4524     if (isNaN(start) || isNaN(end)) {
4525         //throw  "No legal start or end date in method setRange";
4526         return;
4527     }
4528 
4529     this._start      = (start != undefined)  ? new Date(start) : new Date();
4530     this._end        = (end != undefined)    ? new Date(end) : new Date();
4531 
4532     if (this.autoScale) {
4533         this.setMinimumStep(minimumStep);
4534     }
4535 };
4536 
4537 /**
4538  * Set the step iterator to the start date.
4539  */
4540 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.start = function() {
4541     this.current = new Date(this._start);
4542     this.roundToMinor();
4543 };
4544 
4545 /**
4546  * Round the current date to the first minor date value
4547  * This must be executed once when the current date is set to start Date
4548  */
4549 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.roundToMinor = function() {
4550     // round to floor
4551     // IMPORTANT: we have no breaks in this switch! (this is no bug)
4552     switch (this.scale) {
4553         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:
4554             this.current.setFullYear(this.step * Math.floor(this.current.getFullYear() / this.step));
4555             this.current.setMonth(0);
4556         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:        this.current.setDate(1);
4557         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:          this.current.setHours(0);
4558         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:         this.current.setMinutes(0);
4559         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:       this.current.setSeconds(0);
4560         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:       this.current.setMilliseconds(0);
4561         //case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND: // nothing to do for milliseconds
4562     }
4563 
4564     if (this.step != 1) {
4565         // round down to the first minor value that is a multiple of the current step size
4566         switch (this.scale) {
4567             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:  this.current.setMilliseconds(this.current.getMilliseconds() - this.current.getMilliseconds() % this.step);  break;
4568             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:       this.current.setSeconds(this.current.getSeconds() - this.current.getSeconds() % this.step);  break;
4569             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:       this.current.setMinutes(this.current.getMinutes() - this.current.getMinutes() % this.step);  break;
4570             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:         this.current.setHours(this.current.getHours() - this.current.getHours() % this.step);  break;
4571             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:          this.current.setDate((this.current.getDate()-1) - (this.current.getDate()-1) % this.step + 1);  break;
4572             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:        this.current.setMonth(this.current.getMonth() - this.current.getMonth() % this.step);  break;
4573             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:         this.current.setFullYear(this.current.getFullYear() - this.current.getFullYear() % this.step); break;
4574             default:                      break;
4575         }
4576     }
4577 };
4578 
4579 /**
4580  * Check if the end date is reached
4581  * @return {boolean}  true if the current date has passed the end date
4582  */
4583 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.end = function () {
4584     return (this.current.getTime() > this._end.getTime());
4585 };
4586 
4587 /**
4588  * Do the next step
4589  */
4590 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.next = function() {
4591     var prev = this.current.getTime();
4592 
4593     // Two cases, needed to prevent issues with switching daylight savings 
4594     // (end of March and end of October)
4595     if (this.current.getMonth() < 6)   {
4596         switch (this.scale)
4597         {
4598             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:
4599 
4600                 this.current = new Date(this.current.getTime() + this.step); break;
4601             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:       this.current = new Date(this.current.getTime() + this.step * 1000); break;
4602             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:       this.current = new Date(this.current.getTime() + this.step * 1000 * 60); break;
4603             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:
4604                 this.current = new Date(this.current.getTime() + this.step * 1000 * 60 * 60);
4605                 // in case of skipping an hour for daylight savings, adjust the hour again (else you get: 0h 5h 9h ... instead of 0h 4h 8h ...)
4606                 var h = this.current.getHours();
4607                 this.current.setHours(h - (h % this.step));
4608                 break;
4609             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:          this.current.setDate(this.current.getDate() + this.step); break;
4610             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:        this.current.setMonth(this.current.getMonth() + this.step); break;
4611             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:         this.current.setFullYear(this.current.getFullYear() + this.step); break;
4612             default:                      break;
4613         }
4614     }
4615     else {
4616         switch (this.scale)
4617         {
4618             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:
4619 
4620                 this.current = new Date(this.current.getTime() + this.step); break;
4621             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:       this.current.setSeconds(this.current.getSeconds() + this.step); break;
4622             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:       this.current.setMinutes(this.current.getMinutes() + this.step); break;
4623             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:         this.current.setHours(this.current.getHours() + this.step); break;
4624             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:          this.current.setDate(this.current.getDate() + this.step); break;
4625             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:        this.current.setMonth(this.current.getMonth() + this.step); break;
4626             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:         this.current.setFullYear(this.current.getFullYear() + this.step); break;
4627             default:                      break;
4628         }
4629     }
4630 
4631     if (this.step != 1) {
4632         // round down to the correct major value
4633         switch (this.scale) {
4634             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:  if(this.current.getMilliseconds() < this.step) this.current.setMilliseconds(0);  break;
4635             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:       if(this.current.getSeconds() < this.step) this.current.setSeconds(0);  break;
4636             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:       if(this.current.getMinutes() < this.step) this.current.setMinutes(0);  break;
4637             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:         if(this.current.getHours() < this.step) this.current.setHours(0);  break;
4638             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:          if(this.current.getDate() < this.step+1) this.current.setDate(1); break;
4639             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:        if(this.current.getMonth() < this.step) this.current.setMonth(0);  break;
4640             case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:         break; // nothing to do for year
4641             default:                break;
4642         }
4643     }
4644 
4645     // safety mechanism: if current time is still unchanged, move to the end
4646     if (this.current.getTime() == prev) {
4647         this.current = new Date(this._end);
4648     }
4649 };
4650

4660 /**
4661  * Set a custom scale. Autoscaling will be disabled.
4662  * For example setScale(SCALE.MINUTES, 5) will result
4663  * in minor steps of 5 minutes, and major steps of an hour.
4664  *
4665  * @param {links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE} newScale
4666  *                               A scale. Choose from SCALE.MILLISECOND,
4667  *                               SCALE.SECOND, SCALE.MINUTE, SCALE.HOUR,
4668  *                               SCALE.DAY, SCALE.MONTH, SCALE.YEAR.
4669  * @param {int}        newStep   A step size, by default 1. Choose for
4670  *                               example 1, 2, 5, or 10.
4671  */
4672 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.setScale = function(newScale, newStep) {
4673     this.scale = newScale;
4674 
4675     if (newStep > 0)
4676         this.step = newStep;
4677 
4678     this.autoScale = false;
4679 };

4681 /**
4682  * Enable or disable autoscaling

4689 
4690 /**
4691  * Automatically determine the scale that bests fits the provided minimum step
4692  * @param {int} minimumStep  The minimum step size in milliseconds
4693  */
4694 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.setMinimumStep = function(minimumStep) {
4695     if (minimumStep == undefined)
4696         return;
4697 
4698     var stepYear       = (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30 * 12);
4699     var stepMonth      = (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30);
4700     var stepDay        = (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24);
4701     var stepHour       = (1000 * 60 * 60);
4702     var stepMinute     = (1000 * 60);
4703     var stepSecond     = (1000);
4704     var stepMillisecond= (1);
4705 
4706     // find the smallest step that is larger than the provided minimumStep
4707     if (stepYear*1000 > minimumStep)        {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 1000;}
4708     if (stepYear*500 > minimumStep)         {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 500;}
4709     if (stepYear*100 > minimumStep)         {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 100;}
4710     if (stepYear*50 > minimumStep)          {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 50;}
4711     if (stepYear*10 > minimumStep)          {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 10;}
4712     if (stepYear*5 > minimumStep)           {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 5;}
4713     if (stepYear > minimumStep)             {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR;        this.step = 1;}
4714     if (stepMonth*3 > minimumStep)          {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH;       this.step = 3;}
4715     if (stepMonth > minimumStep)            {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH;       this.step = 1;}
4716     if (stepDay*5 > minimumStep)            {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY;         this.step = 5;}
4717     if (stepDay*2 > minimumStep)            {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY;         this.step = 2;}
4718     if (stepDay > minimumStep)              {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY;         this.step = 1;}
4719     if (stepHour*4 > minimumStep)           {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR;        this.step = 4;}
4720     if (stepHour > minimumStep)             {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR;        this.step = 1;}
4721     if (stepMinute*15 > minimumStep)        {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE;      this.step = 15;}
4722     if (stepMinute*10 > minimumStep)        {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE;      this.step = 10;}
4723     if (stepMinute*5 > minimumStep)         {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE;      this.step = 5;}
4724     if (stepMinute > minimumStep)           {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE;      this.step = 1;}
4725     if (stepSecond*15 > minimumStep)        {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND;      this.step = 15;}
4726     if (stepSecond*10 > minimumStep)        {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND;      this.step = 10;}
4727     if (stepSecond*5 > minimumStep)         {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND;      this.step = 5;}
4728     if (stepSecond > minimumStep)           {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND;      this.step = 1;}
4729     if (stepMillisecond*200 > minimumStep)  {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND; this.step = 200;}
4730     if (stepMillisecond*100 > minimumStep)  {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND; this.step = 100;}
4731     if (stepMillisecond*50 > minimumStep)   {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND; this.step = 50;}
4732     if (stepMillisecond*10 > minimumStep)   {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND; this.step = 10;}
4733     if (stepMillisecond*5 > minimumStep)    {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND; this.step = 5;}
4734     if (stepMillisecond > minimumStep)      {this.scale = links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND; this.step = 1;}
4735 };
4736 
4737 /**
4738  * Snap a date to a rounded value. The snap intervals are dependent on the
4739  * current scale and step.
4740  * @param {Date} date   the date to be snapped
4741  */
4742 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.snap = function(date) {
4743     if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR) {
4744         var year = date.getFullYear() + Math.round(date.getMonth() / 12);
4745         date.setFullYear(Math.round(year / this.step) * this.step);
4746         date.setMonth(0);
4747         date.setDate(0);
4748         date.setHours(0);
4749         date.setMinutes(0);
4750         date.setSeconds(0);
4751         date.setMilliseconds(0);
4752     }
4753     else if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH) {
4754         if (date.getDate() > 15) {
4755             date.setDate(1);
4756             date.setMonth(date.getMonth() + 1);
4757             // important: first set Date to 1, after that change the month.      
4758         }
4759         else {
4760             date.setDate(1);
4761         }
4762 
4763         date.setHours(0);
4764         date.setMinutes(0);
4765         date.setSeconds(0);
4766         date.setMilliseconds(0);
4767     }
4768     else if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY) {
4769         switch (this.step) {
4770             case 5:
4771             case 2:
4772                 date.setHours(Math.round(date.getHours() / 24) * 24); break;
4773             default:
4774                 date.setHours(Math.round(date.getHours() / 12) * 12); break;
4775         }
4776         date.setMinutes(0);
4777         date.setSeconds(0);
4778         date.setMilliseconds(0);
4779     }
4780     else if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR) {
4781         switch (this.step) {
4782             case 4:
4783                 date.setMinutes(Math.round(date.getMinutes() / 60) * 60); break;
4784             default:
4785                 date.setMinutes(Math.round(date.getMinutes() / 30) * 30); break;
4786         }
4787         date.setSeconds(0);
4788         date.setMilliseconds(0);
4789     } else if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE) {
4790         switch (this.step) {
4791             case 15:
4792             case 10:
4793                 date.setMinutes(Math.round(date.getMinutes() / 5) * 5);
4794                 date.setSeconds(0);
4795                 break;
4796             case 5:
4797                 date.setSeconds(Math.round(date.getSeconds() / 60) * 60); break;
4798             default:
4799                 date.setSeconds(Math.round(date.getSeconds() / 30) * 30); break;
4800         }
4801         date.setMilliseconds(0);
4802     }
4803     else if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND) {
4804         switch (this.step) {
4805             case 15:
4806             case 10:
4807                 date.setSeconds(Math.round(date.getSeconds() / 5) * 5);
4808                 date.setMilliseconds(0);
4809                 break;
4810             case 5:
4811                 date.setMilliseconds(Math.round(date.getMilliseconds() / 1000) * 1000); break;
4812             default:
4813                 date.setMilliseconds(Math.round(date.getMilliseconds() / 500) * 500); break;
4814         }
4815     }
4816     else if (this.scale == links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND) {
4817         var step = this.step > 5 ? this.step / 2 : 1;
4818         date.setMilliseconds(Math.round(date.getMilliseconds() / step) * step);
4819     }
4820 };
4821 
4822 /**
4823  * Check if the current step is a major step (for example when the step
4824  * is DAY, a major step is each first day of the MONTH)
4825  * @return true if current date is major, else false.
4826  */
4827 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.isMajor = function() {
4828     switch (this.scale)
4829     {
4830         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:
4831             return (this.current.getMilliseconds() == 0);
4832         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:
4833             return (this.current.getSeconds() == 0);
4834         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:
4835             return (this.current.getHours() == 0) && (this.current.getMinutes() == 0);
4836         // Note: this is no bug. Major label is equal for both minute and hour scale
4837         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:
4838             return (this.current.getHours() == 0);
4839         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:
4840             return (this.current.getDate() == 1);
4841         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:
4842             return (this.current.getMonth() == 0);
4843         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:
4844             return false;
4845         default:
4846             return false;
4847     }
4848 };

4851 /**
4852  * Returns formatted text for the minor axislabel, depending on the current
4853  * date and the scale. For example when scale is MINUTE, the current time is
4854  * formatted as "hh:mm".
4855  * @param {Date} [date] custom date. if not provided, current date is taken
4856  * @return {string}     minor axislabel
4857  */
4858 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.getLabelMinor = function(date) {
4859     var MONTHS_SHORT = new Array("Jan", "Feb", "Mar",
4860         "Apr", "May", "Jun",
4861         "Jul", "Aug", "Sep",
4862         "Oct", "Nov", "Dec");
4863 
4864     if (date == undefined) {
4865         date = this.current;
4866     }
4867 
4868     switch (this.scale)
4869     {
4870         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:  return String(date.getMilliseconds());
4871         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:       return String(date.getSeconds());
4872         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:       return this.addZeros(date.getHours(), 2) + ":" +
4873             this.addZeros(date.getMinutes(), 2);
4874         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:         return this.addZeros(date.getHours(), 2) + ":" +
4875             this.addZeros(date.getMinutes(), 2);
4876         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:          return String(date.getDate());
4877         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:        return MONTHS_SHORT[date.getMonth()];   // month is zero based
4878         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.YEAR:         return String(date.getFullYear());
4879         default:                                         return "";
4880     }
4881 };
4882 
4883 
4884 /**
4885  * Returns formatted text for the major axislabel, depending on the current
4886  * date and the scale. For example when scale is MINUTE, the major scale is
4887  * hours, and the hour will be formatted as "hh".
4888  * @param {Date} [date] custom date. if not provided, current date is taken
4889  * @return {string}     major axislabel
4890  */
4891 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.getLabelMajor = function(date) {
4892     var MONTHS = new Array("January", "February", "March",
4893         "April", "May", "June",
4894         "July", "August", "September",
4895         "October", "November", "December");
4896     var DAYS = new Array("Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday",
4897         "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday");
4898 
4899     if (date == undefined) {
4900         date = this.current;
4901     }
4902 
4903     switch (this.scale) {
4904         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MILLISECOND:
4905             return  this.addZeros(date.getHours(), 2) + ":" +
4906                 this.addZeros(date.getMinutes(), 2) + ":" +
4907                 this.addZeros(date.getSeconds(), 2);
4908         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.SECOND:
4909             return  date.getDate() + " " +
4910                 MONTHS[date.getMonth()] + " " +
4911                 this.addZeros(date.getHours(), 2) + ":" +
4912                 this.addZeros(date.getMinutes(), 2);
4913         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MINUTE:
4914             return  DAYS[date.getDay()] + " " +
4915                 date.getDate() + " " +
4916                 MONTHS[date.getMonth()] + " " +
4917                 date.getFullYear();
4918         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.HOUR:
4919             return  DAYS[date.getDay()] + " " +
4920                 date.getDate() + " " +
4921                 MONTHS[date.getMonth()] + " " +
4922                 date.getFullYear();
4923         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.DAY:
4924             return  MONTHS[date.getMonth()] + " " +
4925                 date.getFullYear();
4926         case links.Timeline.StepDate.SCALE.MONTH:
4927             return String(date.getFullYear());
4928         default:
4929             return "";
4930     }
4931 };
4932 
4933 /**
4934  * Add leading zeros to the given value to match the desired length.
4935  * For example addZeros(123, 5) returns "00123"
4936  * @param {int} value   A value
4937  * @param {int} len     Desired final length
4938  * @return {string}     value with leading zeros
4939  */
4940 links.Timeline.StepDate.prototype.addZeros = function(value, len) {
4941     var str = "" + value;
4942     while (str.length < len) {
4943         str = "0" + str;
4944     }
4945     return str;
4946 };

4951 
4952 /**
4953  * Image Loader service.
4954  * can be used to get a callback when a certain image is loaded
4955  *
4956  */
4957 links.imageloader = (function () {
4958     var urls = {};  // the loaded urls
4959     var callbacks = {}; // the urls currently being loaded. Each key contains 
4960     // an array with callbacks
4961 
4962     /**
4963      * Check if an image url is loaded
4964      * @param {String} url
4965      * @return {boolean} loaded   True when loaded, false when not loaded
4966      *                            or when being loaded
4967      */
4968     function isLoaded (url) {
4969         if (urls[url] == true) {
4970             return true;
4971         }
4972 
4973         var image = new Image();
4974         image.src = url;
4975         if (image.complete) {
4976             return true;
4977         }
4978 
4979         return false;
4980     }
4981 
4982     /**
4983      * Check if an image url is being loaded
4984      * @param {String} url
4985      * @return {boolean} loading   True when being loaded, false when not loading
4986      *                             or when already loaded
4987      */
4988     function isLoading (url) {
4989         return (callbacks[url] != undefined);
4990     }
4991 
4992     /**
4993      * Load given image url
4994      * @param {String} url
4995      * @param {function} callback
4996      * @param {boolean} sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded  optional
4997      */
4998     function load (url, callback, sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded) {
4999         if (sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded == undefined) {
5000             sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded = true;
5001         }
5002 
5003         if (isLoaded(url)) {
5004             if (sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded) {
5005                 callback(url);
5006             }
5007             return;
5008         }
5009 
5010         if (isLoading(url) && !sendCallbackWhenAlreadyLoaded) {
5011             return;
5012         }
5013 
5014         var c = callbacks[url];
5015         if (!c) {
5016             var image = new Image();
5017             image.src = url;
5018 
5019             c = [];
5020             callbacks[url] = c;
5021 
5022             image.onload = function (event) {
5023                 urls[url] = true;
5024                 delete callbacks[url];
5025 
5026                 for (var i = 0; i < c.length; i++) {
5027                     c[i](url);
5028                 }
5029             }
5030         }
5031 
5032         if (c.indexOf(callback) == -1) {
5033             c.push(callback);
5034         }
5035     }
5036 
5037     return {
5038         'isLoaded': isLoaded,
5039         'isLoading': isLoading,
5040         'load': load
5041     };
5042 })();

5048 /**
5049  * Add and event listener. Works for all browsers
5050  * @param {Element} element    An html element
5051  * @param {string}      action     The action, for example "click",
5052  *                                 without the prefix "on"
5053  * @param {function}    listener   The callback function to be executed
5054  * @param {boolean}     useCapture
5055  */
5056 links.Timeline.addEventListener = function (element, action, listener, useCapture) {
5057     if (element.addEventListener) {
5058         if (useCapture === undefined)
5059             useCapture = false;
5060 
5061         if (action === "mousewheel" && navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Firefox") >= 0) {
5062             action = "DOMMouseScroll";  // For Firefox
5063         }
5064 
5065         element.addEventListener(action, listener, useCapture);
5066     } else {
5067         element.attachEvent("on" + action, listener);  // IE browsers
5068     }
5069 };
5070 
5071 /**
5072  * Remove an event listener from an element
5073  * @param {Element}  element   An html dom element
5074  * @param {string}       action    The name of the event, for example "mousedown"
5075  * @param {function}     listener  The listener function
5076  * @param {boolean}      useCapture
5077  */
5078 links.Timeline.removeEventListener = function(element, action, listener, useCapture) {
5079     if (element.removeEventListener) {
5080         // non-IE browsers
5081         if (useCapture === undefined)
5082             useCapture = false;
5083 
5084         if (action === "mousewheel" && navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Firefox") >= 0) {
5085             action = "DOMMouseScroll";  // For Firefox
5086         }
5087 
5088         element.removeEventListener(action, listener, useCapture);
5089     } else {
5090         // IE browsers
5091         element.detachEvent("on" + action, listener);
5092     }
5093 };
5094 
5095 
5096 /**
5097  * Get HTML element which is the target of the event
5098  * @param {MouseEvent} event
5099  * @return {Element} target element
5100  */
5101 links.Timeline.getTarget = function (event) {
5102     // code from http://www.quirksmode.org/js/events_properties.html
5103     if (!event) {
5104         event = window.event;
5105     }
5106 
5107     var target;
5108 
5109     if (event.target) {
5110         target = event.target;
5111     }
5112     else if (event.srcElement) {
5113         target = event.srcElement;
5114     }
5115 
5116     if (target.nodeType !== undefined && target.nodeType == 3) {
5117         // defeat Safari bug
5118         target = target.parentNode;
5119     }
5120 
5121     return target;
5122 };
5123 
5124 /**
5125  * Stop event propagation
5126  */
5127 links.Timeline.stopPropagation = function (event) {
5128     if (!event)
5129         event = window.event;
5130 
5131     if (event.stopPropagation) {
5132         event.stopPropagation();  // non-IE browsers
5133     }
5134     else {
5135         event.cancelBubble = true;  // IE browsers
5136     }
5137 };
5138 
5139 
5140 /**
5141  * Cancels the event if it is cancelable, without stopping further propagation of the event.
5142  */
5143 links.Timeline.preventDefault = function (event) {
5144     if (!event)
5145         event = window.event;
5146 
5147     if (event.preventDefault) {
5148         event.preventDefault();  // non-IE browsers
5149     }
5150     else {
5151         event.returnValue = false;  // IE browsers
5152     }
5153 };

5156 /**
5157  * Retrieve the absolute left value of a DOM element
5158  * @param {Element} elem        A dom element, for example a div
5159  * @return {number} left        The absolute left position of this element
5160  *                              in the browser page.
5161  */
5162 links.Timeline.getAbsoluteLeft = function(elem) {
5163     var left = 0;
5164     while( elem != null ) {
5165         left += elem.offsetLeft;
5166         left -= elem.scrollLeft;
5167         elem = elem.offsetParent;
5168     }
5169     if (!document.body.scrollLeft && window.pageXOffset) {
5170         // FF
5171         left -= window.pageXOffset;
5172     }
5173     return left;
5174 };
5175 
5176 /**
5177  * Retrieve the absolute top value of a DOM element
5178  * @param {Element} elem        A dom element, for example a div
5179  * @return {number} top        The absolute top position of this element
5180  *                              in the browser page.
5181  */
5182 links.Timeline.getAbsoluteTop = function(elem) {
5183     var top = 0;
5184     while( elem != null ) {
5185         top += elem.offsetTop;
5186         top -= elem.scrollTop;
5187         elem = elem.offsetParent;
5188     }
5189     if (!document.body.scrollTop && window.pageYOffset) {
5190         // FF
5191         top -= window.pageYOffset;
5192     }
5193     return top;
5194 };

5196 /**
5197  * add a className to the given elements style
5198  * @param {Element} elem
5199  * @param {String} className
5200  */
5201 links.Timeline.addClassName = function(elem, className) {
5202     var classes = elem.className.split(' ');
5203     if (classes.indexOf(className) == -1) {
5204         classes.push(className); // add the class to the array
5205         elem.className = classes.join(' ');
5206     }
5207 };
5208 
5209 /**
5210  * add a className to the given elements style
5211  * @param {Element} elem
5212  * @param {String} className
5213  */
5214 links.Timeline.removeClassName = function(elem, className) {
5215     var classes = elem.className.split(' ');
5216     var index = classes.indexOf(className);
5217     if (index != -1) {
5218         classes.splice(index, 1); // remove the class from the array
5219         elem.className = classes.join(' ');
5220     }
5221 };

5223 /**
5224  * Check if given object is a Javascript Array
5225  * @param {*} obj
5226  * @return {Boolean} isArray    true if the given object is an array
5227  */
5228 // See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2943805/javascript-instanceof-typeof-in-gwt-jsni
5229 links.Timeline.isArray = function (obj) {
5230     if (obj instanceof Array) {
5231         return true;
5232     }
5233     return (Object.prototype.toString.call(obj) === '[object Array]');
5234 };
